<article_start> </s> romania ( ; romnia ) is a country located at the crossroad of central europe , eastern europe , and southeast europe . it share land border with bulgaria to the south , ukraine to the north , hungary to the west , serbia to the southwest , and moldova to the east and ha it opening to the black sea . it ha a predominantly temperate climate-continental climate . with a total area of , romania is the list of european country by area twelfth-largest country in europe and the list of european union member state by population sixth-most populous member state of the european union , having approximately 19.3 million inhabitant ( a of 2020 ) . it capital and largest city is bucharest . other major metropolitan area in romania include cluj-napoca , timioara , iai , constana , craiova , braov , and galai . </s> the danube , europe 's second-longest river , rise in germany 's black forest and flow in a generally southeasterly direction for , coursing through ten country before emptying into romania 's danube delta . the carpathian mountain , which cross romania from the north to the southwest , include moldoveanu peak , at an altitude of . </s> modern romania wa formed in 1859 through a personal union of the united principality of moldavia and wallachia of moldavia and wallachia . the new state , officially named romania since 1866 , gained independence from the ottoman empire in 1877 . following the outbreak of world war ; i , after declaring it neutral country in 1914 , romania romania during world war i of the ally of world war i beginning in 1916 . afterwards bukovina , bessarabia , transylvania a well a part of banat , criana , and maramure became part of the sovereign kingdom of romania . in juneaugust ; 1940 , a a consequence of the molotovribbentrop pact and second vienna award , romania wa compelled to cede bessarabia and northern bukovina to the soviet union , and northern transylvania to hungary . in november ; 1940 , romania signed the tripartite pact and , consequently , in june ; 1941 entered world war ; ii on the axis power , romania during world war ii until august ; 1944 , when it king michael 's coup the ally of world war ii and recovered northern transylvania . following the war , under the occupation of the red army 's force , romania became a socialist republic of romania and a member of the warsaw pact . after the romanian revolution 1989 ; revolution , romania history of romania since 1989 towards democracy and a market economy . </s> romania rank 52nd in the human development index , and is a developing country with a world bank high-income economy high-income economy . it ha the world 's list of country by gdp ( nominal ) 45th ; largest economy by nominal gdp , with an annual economic growth rate of 3.5 % a of 2020 . following rapid economic growth in the early 2000s , romania ha an economy based predominantly on service and is a producer and net exporter of machine and electric energy , featuring company like automobile dacia and petrom . it ha been a member of the united nation since 1955 , part of nato since 2004 , and part of the european union since 2007 . the vast majority of the population identifies a ethnic romanian and eastern orthodox church and are native speaker of romanian language , a romance language . </s> <section_title_start> etymology <section_title_end> </s> `` romania `` derives from latin wikt : romanus , meaning `` roman people `` or `` of ancient rome `` . the first known use of the appellation wa attested to in the 16th ; century by italian humanist travelling in transylvania , moldavia , and wallachia . </s> the oldest known surviving document written in romanian language , a 1521 letter known a the `` neacu 's letter `` , is notable for including the first documented occurrence of the country 's name : wallachia is mentioned a eara rumneasc ( old spelling for `` the romanian land `` ; eara from the latin terra , `` land `` ; current spelling : ara romneasc ) . </s> two spelling form : romn and rumn were used interchangeably until sociolinguistic development in the late 17th ; century led to semantic differentiation of the two form : rumn came to mean `` indentured servant `` , while romn retained the original ethnolinguistic meaning . after the abolition of serfdom in 1746 , the word rumn gradually fell out of use and the spelling stabilised to the form romn . tudor vladimirescu , a revolutionary leader of the early 19th ; century , used the term rumnia to refer exclusively to the principality of wallachia . </s> the use of the name romania to refer to the common homeland of all romaniansits modern-day meaningwas first documented in the early 19th ; century.on the [ of gheorghe lazr ] in [ [ avrig ( built in 1823 ) there is the inscription : `` precum hristos pe lazr din mori a nviat/aa tu romnia din somn ai deteptat . `` </s> in english , the name of the country wa formerly spelt rumania or roumania . romania became the predominant spelling around 1975 . romania is also the official english-language spelling used by the romanian government . a handful of other language ( including italian , hungarian , portuguese , and norwegian ) have also switched to `` o `` like english , but most language continue to prefer form with u , e.g . french roumanie , german and swedish rumnien , spanish rumania ( the archaic form rumana is still in use in spain ) , polish rumunia , russian ( rumyniya ) , and japanese ( rmania ) . </s> <section_title_start> official names <section_title_end> </s> * 18591862 : united principality of moldavia and wallachia </s> * 18621866 : united principality of moldavia and wallachia or romania </s> * 18661881 : united principality or principality of romania </s> * 18811947 : kingdom of romania or romania </s> * 19471965 : socialist republic of romania romanian people 's republic ( rpr ) or romania </s> * 1965romanian revolution : socialist republic of romania ( rsr ) or romania </s> * december 1989present : romania </s> <section_title_start> history <section_title_end> </s> <section_title_start> prehistory <section_title_end> </s> human remains found in petera cu oase ( `` cave with bone `` ) , radiocarbon dated a being from circa 40,000 year ago , represent the oldest known homo sapiens in europe . neolithic technique and agriculture spread after the arrival of a mixed group of people from thessaly in the 6th ; millennium bc . excavation near a salt spring at vntori-neam yielded the earliest evidence for salt exploitation in europe ; here salt production began between 5th millennium bc and 4th bc . the first permanent settlement also appeared in the neolithic . some of them developed into `` proto-cities `` , which were larger than . the cucutenitrypillia culturethe best known archaeological culture of old europe ( archaeology ) flourished in muntenia , southeastern transylvania and northeastern moldavia in the 3rd ; millennium ; bc . </s> the first fortified settlement appeared around 1800 ; bc , showing the militant character of bronze age society . </s> <section_title_start> antiquity <section_title_end> </s> greek colony established on the black sea coast in the 7th ; century ; bc became important centre of commerce with the local tribe . among the native people , herodotus listed the getae of the lower danube region , the agathyrsi of transylvania and the syginnae of the plain along the river tisza at the beginning of the 5th ; century ; bc . century later , strabo associated the getae with the dacians who dominated the land along the southern carpathian mountain in the 1st ; century ; bc . burebista wa the first dacian ruler to unite the local tribe . he also conquered the greek colony in dobruja and the neighbouring people a far a the middle danube and the balkan mountain between around 55 ; and ; 44 bc . after burebista wa murdered in 44 ; bc , his empire collapsed . </s> the roman reached dacia during burebista 's reign and conquered dobruja in 46 ; ad . dacia wa again united under decebalus around 85 ; ad . he resisted the roman for decade , but the roman army defeated his troop in 106 ; ad . emperor trajan transformed banat , oltenia and the greater part of transylvania into the new roman province of roman dacia , but dacian , germanic people and sarmatians tribe continued to dominate the land along the roman frontier . the roman pursued an organised colonisation policy , and the provincial enjoyed a long period of peace and prosperity in the 2nd ; century . scholar accepting the daco-roman continuity theoryone of the main theory about the origin of the romanianssay that the cohabitation of the native dacians and the roman colonist in roman dacia wa the first phase of the romanian ' ethnogenesis . </s> the carpians , goth and other neighbouring tribe made regular raid against dacia from the ; 210s . the roman could not resist , and emperor aurelian ordered the evacuation of the province dacia trajana in ; 271 . scholar supporting the continuity theory are convinced that most latin-speaking commoner stayed behind when the army and civil administration wa withdrawn . the roman did not abandon their fortress along the northern bank of the lower danube for decade , and dobruja ( known a scythia minor ) remained an integral part of the roman empire until the early 7th ; century . </s> <section_title_start> middle ages <section_title_end> </s> the goth were expanding towards the lower danube from the ; 230s , forcing the native people to flee to the roman empire or to accept their suzerainty . the goth ' rule ended abruptly when the hun invaded their territory in ; 376 , causing new wave of migration . the hun forced the remnant of the local population into submission , but their empire collapsed in ; 454 . the gepids took possession of the former dacia province . the nomadic pannonian avars defeated the gepids and established a powerful empire around ; 570 . the bulgars , who also came from the eurasian steppe , occupied the lower danube region in ; 680. </s> place name that are of slavic language origin abound in romania , indicating that a significant slavic-speaking population used to live in the territory . the first early slav group settled in moldavia and wallachia in the 6th ; century , in transylvania around ; 600 . after the avar khaganate collapsed in the ; 790s , bulgaria became the dominant power of the region , occupying land a far a the river tisa . the council of preslav declared old church slavonic the language of liturgy in the first bulgarian empire in ; 893 . the romanian also adopted old church slavonic a their liturgical language . </s> the magyar ( or hungarian ) took control of the steppe north of the lower danube in the ; 830s , but the bulgarian and the pechenegs jointly forced them to abandon this region for the great hungarian plain around ; 894 . century later , the gesta hungarorum wrote of the invading magyar ' war against three dukesglad ( duke ) , menumorut and the vlach geloufor banat , criana and transylvania . the gesta also listed many peoplesslavs , bulgarian , vlachs , khazars , and szkelysinhabiting the same region . the reliability of the gesta is debated . some scholar regard it a a basically accurate account , others describe it a a literary work filled with invented detail . the pechenegs seized the lowland abandoned by the hungarian to the east of the carpathians . </s> byzantine empire missionary proselytised in the land east of the tisa from the ; 940s and byzantine troop occupied dobruja in the ; 970s . the first king of hungary , stephen i of hungary stephen ; i , who supported western european missionary , defeated the local chieftain and established catholic church in romania ( office of a bishop ) in transylvania and banat in the early 11th ; century . significant pecheneg group fled to the byzantine empire in the ; 1040s ; the oghuz turk followed them , and the nomadic cumans became the dominant power of the steppe in the ; 1060s . cooperation between the cumans and the vlachs against the byzantine empire is well documented from the end of the 11th ; century . scholar who reject the daco-roman continuity theory say that the first vlach group left their balkan peninsula homeland for the mountain pasture of the eastern and southern carpathians in the 11th ; century , establishing the romanian ' presence in the land to the north of the lower danube . </s> exposed to nomadic incursion , transylvania developed into an important border province of the kingdom of hungary . the szkelysa community of free warriorssettled in central transylvania around ; 1100 and moved to the easternmost region around ; 1200 . colonist from the holy roman empirethe transylvanian saxon ' ancestorscame to the province in the ; 1150s . a high-ranking royal official , styled voivode of transylvania , ruled the transylvanian county of hungary ( before 1920 ) from the ; 1170s , but the szkely and saxon seat ( territorial administrative unit ) ( or district ) were not subject to the voivodes ' authority . royal charter wrote of the `` vlachs ' land `` in southern transylvania in the early 13th ; century , indicating the existence of romanian district . papal correspondence mention the activity of orthodox prelate among the romanian in muntenia in the ; 1230s . also in the 13th ; century , during one of it greatest period of expansion , the republic of genoa started establishing many genoese colony and commercial and military port on the black sea , in the current territory of romania . the largest genoese colony in present-day romania were calafat ( still known a such ) , constana ( costanza ) , galai ( caladda ) , giurgiu ( san giorgio ) , licostomo and vicina ( town ) ( unknown modern location ) . these would last until the 15th ; century . </s> the mongol destroyed large territory during mongol invasion of europe in ; 1241 and ; 1242 . the mongol ' golden horde emerged a the dominant power of eastern europe , but bla ; iv of hungary 's land grant to the knight hospitallers in oltenia and muntenia show that the local vlach ruler were subject to the king 's authority in ; 1247 . basarab ; i of wallachia united the romanian polity between the southern carpathians and the lower danube in the ; 1310s . he defeated the hungarian royal army in the battle of posada and secured the independence of principality of wallachia in ; 1330 . the second romanian principality , principality of moldavia , achieved full autonomy during the reign of bogdan i of moldavia bogdan ; i around ; 1360 . a local dynasty ruled the despotate of dobruja in the second half of the 14th ; century , but the ottoman empire took possession of the territory after ; 1388. </s> prince mircea i of wallachia mircea ; i and vlad the impaler vlad ; iii of wallachia , and stephen the great stephen ; iii of moldavia defended their country ' independence against the ottoman . most wallachian and moldavian prince paid a regular tribute to the ottoman sultan from ; 1417 and ; 1456 , respectively . a military commander of romanian origin , john hunyadi , organised the defence of the kingdom of hungary until his death in ; 1456 . increasing tax outraged the transylvanian peasant , and transylvanian peasant revolt in ; 1437 , but the hungarian noble and the head of the saxon and szkely community jointly suppressed their revolt . the formal alliance of the hungarian , saxon , and szkely leader , known a the unio trium nationum , became an important element of the self-government of transylvania . the orthodox romanian knez ( vlach leader ) ( `` chief `` ) were excluded from the union . </s> <section_title_start> early modern time and national awakening <section_title_end> </s> the kingdom of hungary collapsed , and the ottoman occupied part of banat and criana in 1541 . transylvania and maramure , along with the rest of banat and criana developed into a new state under ottoman suzerainty , the principality of transylvania ( 15701711 ) . reformation spread and four denominationsreformed church in romania , evangelical church of augustan confession in romania , unitarian church of transylvania , and roman catholicismwere officially acknowledged in 1568 . the romanian ' orthodox faith remained only tolerated , although they made up more than one-third of the population , according to 17th-century estimation . </s> the prince of transylvania , wallachia , and moldavia joined the holy league ( 1594 ) against the ottoman empire in 1594 . the wallachian prince , michael the brave , united the three principality under his rule in may ; 1600 . the neighboring power forced him to abdicate in september , but he became a symbol of the unification of the romanian land in the 19th ; century . although the ruler of the three principality continued to pay tribute to the ottoman , the most talented princesgabriel bethlen of transylvania , matei basarab of wallachia , and vasile lupu of moldaviastrengthened their autonomy . </s> the united army of the holy league ( 1684 ) expelled the ottoman troop from central europe between 1684 and 1699 , and the principality of transylvania wa integrated into the habsburg monarchy . the habsburg supported the catholic clergy and persuaded the orthodox romanian prelate to accept the church union in 1699 . the church union strengthened the romanian intellectual ' devotion to their roman heritage . the orthodox church wa restored in transylvania only after orthodox monk stirred up revolt in 1744 and 1759 . the organization of the transylvanian military frontier caused further disturbance , siculicidium . </s> prince dimitrie cantemir of moldavia and constantin brncoveanu of wallachia concluded alliance with the habsburg monarchy and russia against the ottoman , but they were dethroned in 1711 and 1714 , respectively . the sultan lost confidence in the native prince and appointed orthodox merchant from the fener district of istanbul to rule moldova and wallachia . the phanariotes prince pursued oppressive fiscal policy and dissolved the army . the neighboring power took advantage of the situation : the habsburg monarchy annexed the northwestern part of moldavia , or bukovina , in 1775 , and the russian empire seized the eastern half of moldavia , or bessarabia , in 1812. </s> a census revealed that the romanian were more numerous than any other ethnic group in transylvania in 1733 , but legislation continued to use contemptuous adjective ( such a `` tolerated `` and `` admitted `` ) when referring to them . the romanian greek catholic church , inoceniu micu-klein who demanded recognition of the romanian a the fourth privileged nation wa forced into exile . uniate and orthodox cleric and layman jointly signed a supplex libellus valachorum plea for the transylvanian romanian ' emancipation in 1791 , but the monarch and the local authority refused to grant their request . </s> <section_title_start> independence and monarchy <section_title_end> </s> the treaty of kk kaynarca authorised the russian ambassador in istanbul to defend the autonomy of moldavia and wallachia ( known a the danubian principality ) in 1774 . taking advantage of the greek war of independence , a wallachian lesser nobleman , tudor vladimirescu , stirred up a revolt against the ottoman in january ; 1821 , but he wa murdered in june by phanariot greek . after a russo-turkish war ( 182829 ) new russo-turkish war , the treaty of adrianople ( 1829 ) strengthened the autonomy of the danubian principality in ; 1829 , although it also acknowledged the sultan 's right to confirm the election of the prince . </s> mihail koglniceanu , nicolae blcescu and other leader of the moldavian revolution of 1848 and wallachian revolution of 1848 demanded the emancipation of the peasant and the union of the two principality , but russian and ottoman troop crushed their revolt . the wallachian revolutionist were the first to adopt the blue , yellow and red tricolour ( flag ) a the flag of romania . in transylvania , most romanian supported the imperial government against the hungarian revolution of 1848 after the diet passed a law concerning the union of transylvania and hungary . bishop andrei aguna proposed the unification of the romanian of the habsburg monarchy in a separate duchy , but the central government refused to change the internal border . </s> the treaty of paris ( 1856 ) put the danubian principality under the collective guardianship of the international relation of the great power ( 18141919 ) in ; 1856 . after ad hoc divan convoked in moldavia and wallachia urged the unification of the two principality , the great power did not prevent the election of alexandru ioan cuza a their collective domnitor ( or ruling prince ) in january 1859 . the united principality of moldavia and wallachia officially adopted the name romania on 21 ; february 1862 . cuza 's government carried out a series of reform , including the secularisation of the property of monastery and agrarian reform , but a coalition of conservative and radical politician forced him to abdicate in february ; 1866. </s> cuza 's successor , a german prince , carol i of romania karl of hohenzollern-sigmaringen ( or carol ; i ) , wa elected in may . the parliament adopted the 1866 constitution of romania in the same year . the great power acknowledged romania 's full independence at the congress of berlin and carol ; i wa crowned king in 1881 . the congress also granted the danube delta and dobruja to romania . although romanian scholar strove for the unification of all romanian into a greater romania , the government did not openly support their irredentism project . </s> the transylvanian romanian and saxon wanted to maintain the separate status of transylvania in the habsburg monarchy , but the austro-hungarian compromise of 1867 austro-hungarian compromise brought about the union of the province with hungary in ; 1867 . ethnic romanian politician sharply opposed the hungarian government 's attempt to transform hungary into a national state , especially the law prescribing the obligatory teaching of hungarian . leader of the romanian national party proposed the federalisation of austria-hungary and the romanian intellectual established a cultural association to promote the use of romanian . </s> <section_title_start> world war and greater romania <section_title_end> </s> fearing russian expansionism , romania secretly joined the triple alliance ( 1882 ) of germany , austria-hungary , and italy in ; 1883 , but public opinion remained hostile to austria-hungary . romania seized southern dobruja from bulgaria in the second balkan war in 1913 . german and austrian-hungarian diplomacy supported bulgaria during the war , bringing about a rapprochement between romania and the triple entente of france , russia and the united kingdom . the country remained neutral when world war ; i broke out in ; 1914 , but prime minister ion i. c. brtianu started negotiation with the entente power . after they promised austrian-hungarian territory with a majority of ethnic romanian population to romania in the treaty of bucharest ( 1916 ) , romania entered the war against the central power in 1916 . the german and austrian-hungarian troop defeated the romanian army and occupied three-quarters of the country by early ; 1917 . after the october revolution turned russia from an ally into an enemy , romania wa forced to sign a treaty of bucharest ( 1918 ) with the central power in may ; 1918 , but the collapse of russia also enabled the union of bessarabia with romania . ferdinand i of romania again mobilised the romanian army on behalf of the entente power a day before armistice of 11 november 1918 on 11 ; november 1918. </s> austria-hungary quickly disintegrated after the war . the general congress of bukovina proclaimed union of bukovina with romania on 28 ; november 1918 , and the 1918 romanian national assembly election proclaimed union of transylvania with romania the union of transylvania , banat , criana and maramure with the kingdom on 1 ; december . peace treaty with austria , bulgaria and hungary delineated the new border in 1919 and 1920 , but the soviet union did not acknowledge the loss of bessarabia . romania achieved it greatest territorial extent , expanding from the pre-war . a new electoral system granted voting right to all adult male citizen , and a series of radical agrarian reform transformed the country into a `` nation of small landowner `` between 1918 and 1921 . gender equality a a principle wa enacted , but woman could not vote or be candidate . calypso botez established the national council of romanian woman to promote feminist idea . romania wa a multiethnic country , with ethnic minority making up about 30 % ; of the population , but the 1923 constitution of romania declared it a unitary national state in 1923 . although minority could establish their own school , romanian language , history and geography could only be taught in romanian . </s> agriculture remained the principal sector of economy , but several branch of industryespecially the production of coal , oil , metal , synthetic rubber , explosive and cosmeticsdeveloped during the interwar period . with oil production of 5.8 ; million ton in 1930 , romania ranked sixth in the world . two party , the national liberal party ( romania , 1875 ) and the national peasant ' party , dominated political life , but the great depression brought about significant change in the 1930s . the democratic party were squeezed between conflict with the fascist and anti-semitic iron guard and the authoritarian tendency of carol ii of romania king carol ; ii . the king promulgated a 1938 constitution of romania and dissolved the political party in 1938 , replacing the parliamentary system with a royal dictatorship . </s> the 1938 munich agreement convinced king carol ; ii that france and the united kingdom could not defend romanian interest . german preparation for a new war required the regular supply of romanian oil and agricultural product . the two country concluded a treaty concerning the coordination of their economic policy in 1939 , but the king could not persuade adolf hitler to guarantee romania 's frontier . romania wa forced to soviet occupation of bessarabia and northern bukovina on 26 ; june 1940 , northern transylvania to hungary on 30 ; august , and southern dobruja to bulgaria in september . after the territorial loss , the king wa forced to abdicate in favour of his minor son , michael i of romania michael ; i , on 6 ; september , and romania wa transformed into a national legionary state national-legionary state under the leadership of general ion antonescu . antonescu signed the tripartite pact of germany , italy and japan on 23 ; november . the iron guard staged a coup against antonescu , but he crushed the riot with german support and introduced a military dictatorship in early 1941. </s> romania entered world war ; ii soon after the operation barbarossa in june 1941 . the country regained bessarabia and northern bukovina , and the german placed transnistria governorate ( the territory between the river dniester and dnieper ) under romanian administration . romanian and german troop massacred at least 160,000 local jew in these territory ; more than 105,000 jew and about 11,000 gypsy died during their deportation from bessarabia to transnistria . most of the jewish population of moldavia , wallachia , banat and southern transylvania survived , but their fundamental right were limited . after the operation margarethe in march 1944 , about 132,000 jew mainly hungarian-speaking were deported to extermination camp from northern transylvania with the hungarian authority ' support . </s> after the soviet victory in the battle of stalingrad in 1943 , iuliu maniu , a leader of the opposition to antonescu , entered into secret negotiation with british diplomat who made it clear that romania had to seek reconciliation with the soviet union . to facilitate the coordination of their activity against antonescu 's regime , the national liberal and national peasant ' party established the national democratic bloc , which also included the romanian social democratic party ( 192748 ) and romanian communist party party . after a successful soviet offensive , the young king michael 's coup king michael ; i ordered antonescu 's arrest and appointed politician from the national democratic bloc to form a new government on 23 ; august 1944 . romania switched side during the war , and nearly 250,000 romanian troop joined the red army 's military campaign against hungary and germany , but joseph stalin regarded the country a an occupied territory within the soviet sphere of influence . stalin 's deputy instructed the king to make the communist ' candidate , petru groza , the prime minister in march 1945 . the romanian administration in northern transylvania wa soon restored , and groza 's government carried out an agrarian reform . in february 1947 , the paris peace treaty , 1947 confirmed the return of northern transylvania to romania , but they also legalised the presence of unit of the red army in the country . </s> <section_title_start> communism <section_title_end> </s> during the soviet occupation of romania , the communist-dominated government called for new 1946 romanian general election in 1946 , which they electoral fraud , with a fabricated 70 % ; majority of the vote . thus , they rapidly established themselves a the dominant political force . gheorghe gheorghiu-dej , a communist party leader imprisoned in 1933 , escaped in 1944 to become romania 's first communist leader . in february 1947 , he and others forced king michael ; i to abdication and leave the country and proclaimed romania a people 's republic . romania remained under the direct military occupation and economic control of the ussr until the late 1950s . during this period , romania 's vast natural resource were drained continuously by mixed soviet-romanian company ( sovroms ) set up for unilateral exploitative purpose . </s> in 1948 , the state began to nationalization in romania private firm and to collectivization in romania agriculture . until the early 1960s , the government severely curtailed political liberty and vigorously suppressed any dissent with the help of the securitatethe romanian secret police . during this period the regime launched several campaign of purge during which numerous `` enemy of the state `` and `` parasite element `` were targeted for different form of punishment including : deportation , internal exile , internment in forced labour camp and prisonssometimes for lifeas well a extrajudicial killing . nevertheless , romanian anti-communist resistance movement anti-communist resistance wa one of the most long-lasting in the eastern bloc . a presidential commission for the study of the communist dictatorship in romania estimated the number of direct victim of the communist repression at two million people . </s> in 1965 , nicolae ceauescu came to power and started to conduct the country 's foreign policy more independently from the soviet union . thus , communist romania wa the only warsaw pact country which refused to participate in the soviet-led warsaw pact invasion of czechoslovakia of czechoslovakia . ceauescu even ceauescu 's speech of 21 august 1968 a `` a big mistake , [ and ] a serious danger to peace in europe and to the fate of communism in the world `` . ) it wa the only communist state to maintain diplomatic relation with israel after 1967 's six-day war and established diplomatic relation with west germany the same year . at the same time , close tie with the arab world and the palestine liberation organization ( plo ) allowed romania to play a key role in the israelegypt and israelplo peace talk . </s> a romania 's foreign debt increased sharply between 1977 and 1981 ( from u $ 3 ; billion to $ 10 ; billion ) , the influence of international financial organisationssuch a the international monetary fund ( imf ) and the world bankgrew , gradually conflicting with ceauescu 's autocracy rule . he eventually initiated a policy of total reimbursement of the foreign debt by imposing 1980s austerity policy in romania that impoverished the population and exhausted the economy . the process succeeded in repaying all of romania 's foreign government debt in 1989 . at the same time , ceauescu greatly extended the authority of the securitate secret police and imposed a severe nicolae ceauescu 's cult of personality , which led to a dramatic decrease in the dictator 's popularity and culminated in his overthrow and eventual execution , together with his wife , in the violent romanian revolution of december 1989 in which thousand were killed or injured . the charge for which they were executed were , among others , genocide by starvation . </s> <section_title_start> contemporary period <section_title_end> </s> after the 1989 revolution , the national salvation front ( romania ) ( nsf ) , led by ion iliescu , took partial multi-party democratic and free market measure . in april 1990 , a sit-in protest contesting the result of 1990 romanian general election that year 's legislative election and accusing the nsf , including iliescu , of being made up of former communist and member of the securitate grew rapidly to become what wa called the golaniad . peaceful demonstration degenerated into violence , prompting the intervention of coal miner summoned by iliescu . this episode ha been documented widely by both local and foreign medium , and is remembered a the june 1990 mineriad . </s> the subsequent disintegration of the front produced several political party , including most notably the social democratic party ( romania ) ( pdsr then psd ) and the democratic party ( romania ) ( pd and subsequently pdl ) . the former governed romania from 1990 until 1996 through several coalition and government , with ion iliescu a head of state . since then , there have been several other democratic change of government : in 1996 emil constantinescu wa elected president , in 2000 iliescu returned to power , while traian bsescu wa elected in 2004 and narrowly re-elected in 2009. </s> in november 2014 , sibiu ( hermannstadt ) former democratic forum of german in romania fdgr/dfdr mayor klaus iohannis wa elected president , unexpectedly defeating former prime minister of romania victor ponta , who had been previously leading in the opinion poll . this surprise victory wa attributed by many analyst to the implication of the romanian diaspora in the voting process , with almost 50 % casting ballot for klaus iohannis in the first round , compared to only 16 % for ponta . in 2019 , iohannis wa re-elected president in a landslide victory over former prime minister viorica dncil . </s> the post1989 period is also characterised by the fact that most of the former industrial and economic enterprise which were built and operated during the communist period were closed , mainly a a result of the policy of privatisation of the post1989 regime . </s> corruption ha also been a corruption in romania in contemporary romanian politics . in november 2015 , massive 2015 romanian protest anti-corruption protest which developed in the wake of the colectiv nightclub fire led to the resignation of romania 's prime minister victor ponta . during 20172018 , in response to measure which were perceived to weaken the fight against corruption , some of the 20172018 romanian protest took place in romania , with over 500,000 people protesting across the country . </s> nevertheless , there have been effort to tackle corruption . a national anticorruption directorate wa formed in the country in 2002 . in transparency international 's 2019 corruption perception index , romania 's public sector corruption score deteriorated to 44 out of 100 , reversing gain made in previous year . </s> <section_title_start> nato and eu integration <section_title_end> </s> after the end of the cold war , romania developed closer tie with western europe and the united state , eventually joining nato in 2004 , and hosting the 2008 bucharest summit in bucharest . </s> the country applied in june 1993 for membership in the european union and became an associated state of the eu in 1995 , an acceding country in 2004 , and a 2007 enlargement of the european union on 1 ; january 2007. </s> during the 2000s , romania enjoyed one of the highest economic growth rate in europe and ha been referred at time a `` the tiger of eastern europe `` . this ha been accompanied by a significant improvement in living standard a the country successfully reduced domestic poverty and established a functional democratic state . however , romania 's development suffered a major setback during the great recession late-2000s ' recession leading to a large gross domestic product contraction and a budget deficit in 2009 . this led to romania borrowing from the international monetary fund . worsening economic condition led to 2012 romanian constitutional crisis and triggered a political crisis in 2012. </s> romania still face problem related to infrastructure , medical service , education in romania , and corruption . near the end of 2013 , the economist reported romania again enjoying `` booming `` economic growth at 4.1 % that year , with wage rising fast and a lower unemployment than in britain . economic growth accelerated in the midst of government liberalisation in opening up new sector to competition and investmentmost notably , energy and telecom . in 2016 the human development index ranked romania a a nation of `` very high human development `` . </s> following the experience of economic instability throughout the 1990s , and the implementation of a free travel agreement with the eu , a great number of romanian emigrated to western europe and north america , with particularly large community in italy , germany and spain . in 2016 , the romanian diaspora wa estimated to be over 3.6 ; million people , the fifth-highest emigrant population in the world . </s> <section_title_start> geography and climate <section_title_end> </s> romania is the largest country in southeast europe and the list of european country by area twelfth-largest in europe , having an area of . it lie between latitude 43rd parallel north 43 and 49th parallel north 49 n and longitude 20th meridian east 20 and 30th meridian east 30 e. </s> the terrain is distributed roughly equally between mountain , hill , and plain . the carpathian mountain dominate the centre of romania , with list of mountain peak in romania reaching above the highest is moldoveanu peak at . they are surrounded by the moldavian plateau and transylvanian plateau plateau , the carpathian basin and the wallachian plain plain . </s> romania is home to six terrestrial ecoregions : balkan mixed forest , central european mixed forest , east european forest steppe , pannonian mixed forest , carpathian montane conifer forest , and pontic steppe . natural and semi-natural ecosystem cover about 47 % of the country 's land area . there are almost ( about 5 % of the total area ) of protected area of romania covering 13 ; national park and three biosphere reserve . </s> the danube river form a large part of the border with serbia and bulgaria , and flow into the black sea , forming the danube delta , which is the second-largest and best-preserved delta in europe , and a biosphere reserve and a biodiversity world heritage site . at , the danube delta is the largest continuous marshland in europe , and support 1,688 different plant specie alone . </s> romania ha one of the largest area of undisturbed forest in europe , covering almost 27 % of it territory . the country had a had a 2019 forest landscape integrity index mean score of 5.95/10 , ranking it 90th globally out of 172 country . some 3,700 plant specie have been identified in the country , from which to date 23 ; have been declared natural monument , 74 ; extinct , 39 ; endangered , 171 ; vulnerable , and 1,253 ; rare . </s> the fauna of romania consists of 33,792 specie of animal , 33,085 ; invertebrate and 707 ; vertebrate , with almost 400 ; unique specie of mammal , bird , reptile , and amphibian , including about 50 % ; of europe 's ( excluding russia ) brown bear and 20 % ; of it wolf . </s> <section_title_start> climate <section_title_end> </s> owing to it distance from open sea and it position on the southeastern portion of the european continent , romania ha a climate that is temperate climate and continental climate , with four distinct season . the average annual temperature is ; in the south and ; in the north . in summer , average maximum temperature in bucharest rise to , and temperature over are fairly common in the lower-lying area of the country . in winter , the average maximum temperature is below . precipitation is average , with over per year only on the highest western mountain , while around bucharest it drop to approximately . </s> there are some regional difference : in western section , such a banat , the climate is milder and ha some mediterranean influence ; the eastern part of the country ha a more pronounced continental climate . in dobruja , the black sea also exerts an influence over the region 's climate . </s> <section_title_start> governance <section_title_end> </s> the constitution of romania is based on constitution of france of france 's french fifth republic and wa approved in a national referendum on 8 ; december 1991 and amended in october 2003 to bring it into conformity with eu legislation . the country is governed on the basis of a multi-party democratic system and the separation of power between the legislative , executive and judicial branch . it is a semi-presidential republic where executive function are held by both the government of romania and the president of romania . the latter is elected by popular vote for a maximum of two term of five year and appoints the prime minister who in turn appoints the romanian cabinet . the legislative branch of the government , collectively known a the parliament of romania ( residing at the palace of the parliament ) , consists of bicameralism ( senate of romania and chamber of deputy of romania ) whose member are elected every four year by plurality voting system . </s> the justice system is independent of the other branch of government and is made up of a hierarchical system of court with the high court of cassation and justice being the supreme court of romania . there are also court of appeal , county court and local court . the romanian judicial system is strongly influenced by the french law , is based on civil law ( legal system ) and is inquisitorial system in nature . the curtea constituional ( curtea constituional ) is responsible for judging the compliance of law and other state regulation with the constitution , which is the fundamental law of the country and can only be amended through a public referendum . romania 's 2007 entry into the eu ha been a significant influence on it domestic policy , and including judicial reform , increased judicial cooperation with other member state , and measure to combat corruption . </s> <section_title_start> foreign relations <section_title_end> </s> since december 1989 , romania ha pursued a policy of strengthening relation with the western world in general , more specifically with the united state and the european union , albeit with limited romaniarussia relation the russia . it joined the nato on 29 ; march 2004 , the european union ( eu ) on 1 ; january 2007 , while it joined the international monetary fund and the world bank in 1972 , and is a founding member of the world trade organization . </s> in the past , recent government have stated that one of their goal is to strengthen tie with and helping other country ( in particular moldova , ukraine , and georgia ( country ) ) with the process of integration with the rest of the west . romania ha also made clear since the late 1990s that it support nato and eu membership for the democratic former soviet republic in eastern europe and the caucasus . romania also declared it public support for turkey , and croatia joining the european union . </s> romania opted on 1 ; january 2007 , to accede to the schengen area , and it bid to join wa approved by the european parliament in june 2011 , but wa rejected by the council of the european union in september 2011 . a of august 2019 , it acceptance into the schengen area is hampered because the european council ha misgiving about romania 's adherence to the rule of law , a fundamental principle of eu membership . </s> in december 2005 , president traian bsescu and united state secretary of state condoleezza rice signed an agreement that would allow a u.s. military presence at several romanian facility primarily in the eastern part of the country . in may 2009 , hillary clinton , u secretary of state , declared that `` romania is one of the most trustworthy and respectable partner of the usa . `` </s> romanian-moldovan relation are a special case given that the two country share the same language and a history of moldavia . a unification of romania and moldova appeared in the early 1990s after both country achieved emancipation from communist rule but lost ground in the mid-1990s when a new moldovan government pursued an agenda towards preserving a moldovan republic independent of romania . after the 2009 moldovan protest and the subsequent removal of communist from power , relation between the two country have improved considerably . </s> <section_title_start> military <section_title_end> </s> the romanian armed force consist of romanian land force , romanian air force , and romanian naval force led by a commander-in-chief under the supervision of the ministry of national defence ( romania ) , and by the president a the supreme commander during wartime . the armed force consist of approximately 15,000 civilian and 75,000 military personnel45,800 for land , 13,250 for air , 6,800 for naval force , and 8,800 in other field . total defence spending in 2007 accounted for 2.05 % ; of total national gdp , or approximately u $ 2.9 ; billion , with a total of $ 11 ; billion spent between 2006 and 2011 for modernization and acquisition of new equipment . </s> the air force currently operates modernised soviet mig-21 lancer fighter . the air force purchased seven new c-27j spartan tactical airlifters , while the naval force acquired two modernised type 22 frigate from the british royal navy . </s> romania contributed troop to the international coalition in war in afghanistan ( 2001present ) beginning in 2002 , with a peak deployment of 1,600 troop in 2010 ( which wa the 4th ; largest contribution according to the u ) . it combat mission in the country concluded in 2014 . romanian troop participated in the history of iraq ( 20032011 ) , reaching a peak of 730 soldier before being slowly drawn down to 350 soldier . romania terminated it mission in iraq and withdrew it last troop on 24 ; july 2009 , among the last country to do so . the frigate the regele ferdinand frigate participated in the 2011 military intervention in libya . </s> in december 2011 , the romanian senate unanimously adopted the draft law ratifying the romaniaunited state relation romania-united state agreement signed in september of the same year that would allow the establishment and operation of a u land-based aegis ballistic missile defense system in romania a part of nato 's effort to build a continental nato missile defence system . </s> <section_title_start> administrative divisions <section_title_end> </s> romania is divided into 41 county of romania ( judee , pronounced judetse ) and the municipality of bucharest . each county is administered by a county council , responsible for local affair , a well a a prefect ( romania ) responsible for the administration of national affair at the county level . the prefect is appointed by the central government but can not be a member of any political party . each county is subdivided further into city of romania and commune of romania , which have their own mayor and local council . there are a total of 320 ; city and 2,861 ; commune in romania . a total of 103 ; of the larger city have municipality of romania status , which give them greater administrative power over local affair . the municipality of bucharest is a special case , a it enjoys a status on par to that of a county . it is further divided into six sector of bucharest and ha a prefect , a general mayor ( primar ) , and a general city council . </s> the nuts-3 ( nomenclature of territorial unit for statistic ) level division of the european union reflect romania 's administrative-territorial structure and correspond to the 41 ; county plus bucharest . the city and commune correspond to the nuts-5 level division , but there are no current nuts-4 level division . the nuts-1 ( four macroregions of romania ) and nuts-2 ( eight development region of romania ) division exist but have no administrative capacity and are used instead for coordinating regional development project and statistical purpose . </s> <section_title_start> economy <section_title_end> </s> in 2019 , romania ha a gdp ( ppp ) of around $ 547 ; billion and a list of country by gdp per caput ( ppp ) ( purchasing power parity ) of $ 28,189 . according to the world bank , romania is a world bank high-income economy high-income economy . according to eurostat , romania 's gdp per caput ( pps ) wa 70 % ; of the eu average ( 100 % ) in 2019 , an increase from 44 % ; in 2007 ( the year of romania 's accession to the eu ) , making romania one of the fastest growing economy in the eu . </s> after 1989 the country experienced a decade of economic instability and decline , led in part by an obsolete industrial base and a lack of structural reform . from 2000 onward , however , the romanian economy wa transformed into one of relative macroeconomic stability , characterised by high growth , low unemployment and declining inflation . in 2006 , according to the national institute of statistic ( romania ) , gdp growth in real term wa recorded at 7.7 % , ; one of the highest rate in europe . however , a recession following the global financial crisis of 20082009 forced the government to borrow externally , including an imf 20 billion bailout program . according to the world bank , gdp per caput in purchasing power parity grew from $ 13,687 in 2007 to $ 28,206 in 2018 . romania 's net average monthly wage increased to 666 euro a of 2020 , and an inflation rate of 1.1 % ; in 2016 . unemployment in romania wa at 4.3 % ; in august 2018 , which is low compared to other eu country . </s> industrial output growth reached 6.5 % ; year-on-year in february 2013 , the highest in the europe . the largest local company include car maker automobile dacia , petrom , rompetrol , ford romania , electrica , romgaz , rcs & rds and banca transilvania . a of 2020 , there are around 6000 export per month . romania 's main export are : car , software , clothing and textile , industrial machinery , electrical and electronic equipment , metallurgic product , raw material , military equipment , pharmaceutical , fine chemical , and agricultural product ( fruit , vegetable , and flower ) . trade is mostly centred on the member state of the european union , with germany and italy being the country 's single largest trading partner . the account balance in 2012 wa estimated to be 4.52 % ; of gdp . </s> after a series of privatization and reform in the late 1990s and 2000s , government intervention in the romanian economy is somewhat le than in other european economy . in 2005 , the government replaced romania 's progressive tax system with a flat tax of 16 % ; for both personal income and corporate profit , among the lowest rate in the european union . the economy is based predominantly on service , which account for 56.2 % ; of the country 's total gdp a of 2017 , with industry and agriculture accounting for 30 % ; and 4.4 % ; respectively . </s> approximately 25.8 % ; of the romanian workforce is employed in agriculture , one of the highest rate in europe . </s> romania ha attracted increasing amount of foreign investment following the end of communism , with the stock of foreign direct investment ( fdi ) in romania rising to 83.8 ; billion in june 2019 . romania 's fdi outward stock ( an external or foreign business either investing in or purchasing the stock of a local economy ) amounted to $ 745 ; million in december 2018 , the lowest value among the 28 eu member state . </s> according to a 2019 world bank report , romania rank 52nd out of 190 economy in the ease of doing business , one place higher than neighbouring hungary and one place lower than italy . the report praised the consistent enforcement of contract and access to credit in the country , while noting difficulty in access to electricity and dealing with construction permit . </s> since 1867 the official currency ha been the romanian leu ( `` lion `` ) and following a denomination in 2005 . after joining the eu in 2007 , romania is expected to adopt the euro in 2024. </s> in january 2020 , romania 's external debt wa reported to be u $ 122 ; billion according to ceic data . </s> <section_title_start> infrastructure <section_title_end> </s> according to the romania 's national institute of statistic ( insse ) , romania 's total road network wa estimated in 2015 at . the world bank estimate the railway network at of track , the fourth-largest railroad network in europe . romania 's cile ferate romne experienced a dramatic decline after 1989 and wa estimated at 99 ; million passenger journey in 2004 , but ha experienced a recent ( 2013 ) revival due to infrastructure improvement and partial privatisation of line , accounting for 45 % ; of all passenger and freight movement in the country . bucharest metro , the only rapid transit railway system , wa opened in 1979 and measure with an average ridership in 2007 of 600,000 passenger during the workweek in the country . there are airport in romania in service today . over 12.8 ; million passenger flew through bucharest 's henri coand international airport in 2017. </s> romania is a net exporter of electrical energy and is 52nd worldwide in term of consumption of electric energy . around a third of the produced energy come from renewable source , mostly a hydroelectric power . in 2015 , the main source were coal ; ( 28 % ) , hydroelectric ; ( 30 % ) , nuclear ; ( 18 % ) , and hydrocarbon ; ( 14 % ) . it ha one of the largest refining capacity in eastern europe , even though oil and natural gas production ha been decreasing for more than a decade . with one of the largest reserve of crude oil and shale gas in europe it is among the most energy-independent country in the european union , and is looking to expand it nuclear power plant at cernavod nuclear power plant further . </s> there were almost 18.3 ; million connection to the internet in june 2014 . according to bloomberg l.p. , in 2013 romania ranked fifth in the world , and according to the independent , it rank number one in europe at internet speed , with timioara ranked among the highest in the world . </s> <section_title_start> tourism <section_title_end> </s> tourism is a significant contributor to the romanian economy , generating around 5 % ; of gdp . the number of tourist ha been rising steadily , reaching 9.33 ; million foreign tourist in 2016 , according to the worldbank . tourism in romania attracted 400 ; million in investment in 2005 . more than 60 % ; of the foreign visitor in 2007 were from other eu country . the popular summer attraction of mamaia and other romanian black sea resort attracted 1.3 ; million tourist in 2009. </s> most popular skiing resort are along the valea prahovei and in poiana braov . list of castle in romania castle , fortification , or stronghold a well a preserved medieval transylvanian city or town such a cluj-napoca , sibiu , braov , bistria , medium , cisndie , or sighioara also attract a large number of tourist . bran castle , near braov , is one of the most famous attraction in romania , drawing hundred of thousand of tourist every year a it is often advertised a being dracula in popular culture 's castle . </s> rural tourism , focusing on folklore and tradition , ha become an important alternative , and is targeted to promote such site a bran , braov and it dracula 's castle , the church of moldavia , and the wooden church of maramure , or the village with fortified church in transylvania . other attraction include the danube delta or the sculptural ensemble of constantin brncui at trgu jiu . </s> in 2014 , romania had 32,500 company active in the hotel and restaurant industry , with a total turnover of 2.6 ; billion . more than 1.9 ; million foreign tourist visited romania in 2014 , 12 % ; more than in 2013 . according to the country 's national statistic institute , some 77 % ; came from europe ( particularly from germany , italy , and france ) , 12 % ; from asia , and le than 7 % ; from north america . </s> <section_title_start> science and technology <section_title_end> </s> historically , romanian researcher and inventor have made notable contribution to several field . in the history of flight , traian vuia built the first airplane to take off under it own power and aurel vlaicu built and flew some of the earliest successful aircraft , while henri coand discovered the coand effect of fluidics . victor babe discovered more than 50 ; type of bacteria ; biologist nicolae paulescu discovered insulin , while emil palade received the nobel prize for his contribution to cell biology . lazr edeleanu wa the first chemist to synthesise amphetamine , and he also invented the procedure of separating valuable petroleum component with selective solvent . </s> during the 1990s and 2000s , the development of research wa hampered by several factor , including : corruption , low funding , and a considerable brain drain . in recent year , romania ha ranked the lowest or second-lowest in the european union by research and development spending a a percentage of gdp , standing at roughly 0.5 % ; in 2016 and 2017 , substantially below the eu average of just over ; 2 % . the country joined the european space agency ( esa ) in 2011 , and cern in 2016 . in 2018 , however , romania lost it voting right in the esa due to a failure to pay 56.8 million in membership contribution to the agency . </s> in the early 2010s , the situation for science in romania wa characterised a `` rapidly improving `` albeit from a low base . in january 2011 , parliament passed a law that enforces `` strict quality control on university and introduces tough rule for funding evaluation and peer review `` . </s> the nuclear physic facility of the european union 's proposed extreme light infrastructure ( eli ) laser will be built in romania . in early 2012 , romania launched it first goliat from the centre spatial guyanais in french guyana . starting in december 2014 , romania became a co-owner of the international space station . </s> <section_title_start> demographics <section_title_end> </s> according to the demographic history of romania , romania 's population wa 20,121,641 . like other country in the region , it population is expected to decline gradually a a result of sub-replacement fertility rate and negative net migration rate . in october 2011 , romanian made up 88.9 % ; of the population . the largest minority of romania are the hungarian people , 6.1 % ; of the population , and the romani people , 3.0 % ; of the population . the romani people in romania is usually underestimated in census data and may represent up to 10 % ; of the population . hungarian constitute a majority in the county of harghita county and covasna county . other minority include ukrainian of romania , german of romania , turk of romania , lipovans , aromanians , tatar of romania , and serb of romania . in 1930 , there were 745,421 german living in romania , but only about 36,000 remained in the country to this day . , there were also approximately 133,000 immigrant living in romania , primarily from moldova and china . </s> the total fertility rate ( tfr ) in 2018 wa estimated at 1.36 ; child born per woman , which is below the replacement rate of 2.1 , ; and one of the lowest in the world , it remains considerably below the high of 5.82 ; child born per woman in 1912 . in 2014 , 31.2 % ; of birth were to unmarried woman . </s> the birth rate ( 9.49 , ; 2012 ) is much lower than the mortality rate ( 11.84 , ; 2012 ) , resulting in a shrinking ( 0.26 % ; per year , 2012 ) and aging population ( median age : 41.6 ; year , 2018 ) , one of the oldest population in the world , with approximately 16.8 % ; of total population aged 65 ; year and over . the life expectancy in 2015 wa estimated at 74.92 ; year ( 71.46 ; year male , 78.59 ; year female ) . </s> the number of romanian and individual with ancestor born in romania living abroad is estimated at around 12 ; million . after the romanian revolution of 1989 , a significant number of romanian emigrated to other european country , north america or australia . for example , in 1990 , 96,919 romanian permanently settled abroad . </s> <section_title_start> languages <section_title_end> </s> the official language is romanian , a romance language ( the most widely spoken of the eastern romance language ) , which present a consistent degree of similarity to aromanian language , megleno-romanian language megleno-romanian , and istro-romanian language istro-romanian , but share many feature equally with the rest of the western romance language , specifically italian language , french language , spanish language , portuguese language , and catalan language . the romanian alphabet contains the same 26 ; letter of the standard latin alphabet , a well a five additional one ( namely , , , , and ) , totaling 31. </s> romanian is spoken a a first language by approximately 90 % ; of the entire population , while hungarian language and vlax romani are spoken by 6.2 % ; and 1.2 % ; of the population , respectively . there are also approximately 50,000 native speaker of ukrainian language ( concentrated in some compact region , near the border where they form local majority ) , 25,000 native speaker of german , and 32,000 native speaker of turkish language living in romania . </s> according to the constitution , local council ensure linguistic right to all minority , with locality with ethnic minority of over ; 20 % , that minority 's language can be used in the public administration , justice system , and education . foreign citizen and stateless person who live in romania have access to justice and education in their own language . english and french are the main foreign language taught in school . in 2010 , the organisation internationale de la francophonie identified 4,756,100 french speaker in the country . according to the 2012 eurobarometer , english is spoken by 31 % ; of romanian , french is spoken by ; 17 % , and italian and german , each by ; 7 % . </s> <section_title_start> religion <section_title_end> </s> romania is a secular state and ha no state religion . an overwhelming majority of the population identify themselves a christian . at the country 's 2011 census , 81.0 % ; of respondent identified a orthodox christian belonging to the romanian orthodox church . other denomination include protestantism ; ( 6.2 % ) , roman catholicism in romania ; ( 4.3 % ) , and romanian greek-catholic church ; ( 0.8 % ) . from the remaining population , 195,569 people belong to other christian denomination or have another religion , which includes 64,337 islam in romania ( mostly of turkish and tatar ethnicity ) and 3,519 history of the jew in romania ( jew once constituted 4 % ; of the romanian population728,115 person in the 1930 census ) . moreover , 39,660 people have no religion or are atheism , whilst the religion of the rest is unknown . </s> the romanian orthodox church is an autocephalous eastern orthodox church in full communion with other orthodox church , with a patriarch of all romania a it leader . it is the fourth-largest orthodox church in the world , and unlike other orthodox church , it function within a latin culture and utilises a romance language liturgical language . it canonical jurisdiction cover the territory of romania and moldova . romania ha the eastern orthodoxy by country world 's third-largest eastern orthodox population . </s> <section_title_start> urbanisation <section_title_end> </s> although 54.0 % ; of the population lived in urban area in 2011 , this percentage ha been declining since 1996 . county with over ; urban population are hunedoara county , braov county and constana county , while those with le than a third are dmbovia county ; ( 30.06 % ) and giurgiu county and teleorman county . bucharest is the capital and the largest city in romania , with a population of over 1.8 ; million in 2011 . it larger urban zone ha a population of almost 2.2 ; million , which are planned to be included into a bucharest metropolitan area up to 20 ; time the area of the city proper . another 19 ; city have a population of over 100,000 , with cluj-napoca and timioara of slightly more than 300,000 inhabitant , iai , constana , craiova , and braov with over 250,000 inhabitant , and galai and ploieti with over 200,000 inhabitant . metropolitan area in romania have been constituted for most of these city . </s> <section_title_start> education <section_title_end> </s> since the romanian revolution of 1989 , the romanian educational system ha been in a continuous process of reform that ha received mixed criticism . in 2004 , some 4.4 ; million individual were enrolled in school . of these , 650,000 were in kindergarten ; ( three-six year ) , 3.11 ; million in primary and secondary level , and 650,000 in tertiary level ( university ) . in 2018 , the adult literacy rate wa ; 98.8 % . kindergarten is optional between three and six year . since 2012 , compulsory schooling start at age 6 with the `` preparatory school year `` ( clasa pregtitoare ) and is compulsory until tenth grade . primary and secondary education is divided into 12 or 13 grade . there is also a semi-legal , informal tutoring # private tutor system used mostly during secondary school , which prospered during the communist regime . </s> alexandru ioan cuza university of iai , babe-bolyai university of cluj-napoca , university of bucharest , and west university of timioara have been included in the q world university ranking ' top 800. </s> romania rank fifth in the all-time medal count at the international mathematical olympiad with 316 total medal , dating back to 1959 . ciprian manolescu managed to write a perfect paper ( 42 point ) for a gold medal more time than anybody else in the history of the competition , in 1995 , 1996 and 1997 . romania ha achieved the highest team score in the competition , after china , russia , the united state and hungary . romania also rank sixth in the all-time medal count at the international olympiad in informatics with 107 total medal , dating back to 1989. </s> <section_title_start> healthcare <section_title_end> </s> romania ha a universal health care system ; total health expenditure by the government are roughly 5 % ; of gdp . it cover medical examination , any surgical intervention , and any post-operative medical care , and provides free or subsidised medicine for a range of disease . the state is obliged to fund public hospital and clinic . the most common cause of death are cardiovascular disease and cancer . transmissible disease are quite common by european standard . in 2010 , romania had 428 ; state and 25 ; private hospital , with 6.2 ; hospital bed per 1,000 ; people , and over 200,000 medical staff , including over 52,000 doctor . , the emigration rate of doctor wa 9 % , ; higher than the european average of 2.5 % . </s> <section_title_start> culture <section_title_end> </s> <section_title_start> arts and monuments <section_title_end> </s> the topic of the origin of romanian culture began to be discussed by the end of the 18th ; century among the transylvanian school scholar . </s> several writer rose to prominence in the 19th ; century , including : george cobuc , ioan slavici , mihail koglniceanu , vasile alecsandri , nicolae blcescu , ion luca caragiale , ion creang , and mihai eminescu , the later being considered the greatest and most influential romanian poet , particularly for the poem luceafrul ( poem ) . </s> in the 20th ; century , a number of romanian artist and writer achieved international acclaim , including : tristan tzara , marcel janco , mircea eliade , nicolae grigorescu , marin preda , liviu rebreanu , eugne ionesco , emil cioran , and constantin brncui . brncui ha a sculptural ensemble in trgu jiu , while his sculpture bird in space , wa auctioned in 2005 for $ 27.5 ; million . romanian-born holocaust survivor elie wiesel received the nobel peace prize in 1986 , while banat swabians writer herta mller received the 2009 nobel prize in literature . </s> prominent romanian painter include : nicolae grigorescu , tefan luchian , ion andreescu nicolae tonitza and theodor aman . notable romanian classical composer of the 19th ; and 20th ; century include : ciprian porumbescu , anton pann , eduard caudella , mihail jora , dinu lipatti and especially george enescu . the annual george enescu festival is held in bucharest in honour of the 20th-century composer . </s> contemporary musician like angela gheorghiu , gheorghe zamfir , inna , alexandra stan and many others have achieved various level of international acclaim . at the eurovision song contest romanian singer achieved third place in 2005 and 2010. </s> in cinema , several movie of the romanian new wave have achieved international acclaim . at the cannes film festival , the death of mr. lazarescu by cristi puiu won the un certain regard # prix un certain regard winner in 2005 , while 4 ; month , 3 ; week and 2 ; day by cristian mungiu won the festival 's top prize , the palme d'or , in 2007 . at the berlin international film festival , child 's pose ( film ) child 's pose by clin peter netzer won the golden bear in 2013. </s> the list of world heritage site includes list of world heritage site in romania located within romania , including eight painted church of northern moldavia , eight wooden church of maramure , seven village with fortified church in transylvania , the horezu monastery , and the historic centre of sighioara . the city of sibiu , with it brukenthal national museum , wa selected a the 2007 european capital of culture . multiple castle exist in romania , including the popular tourist attraction of pele castle , corvin castle , and bran castle or `` dracula 's castle `` . </s> <section_title_start> holidays , tradition , and cuisine <section_title_end> </s> there are 12 non-working public holiday , including the great union day , celebrated on 1 ; december in commemoration of the 1918 union of transylvania with romania . winter holiday include the christmas and new year festivity during which various unique folklore dance and game are common : pluguorul , sorcova , ursul , and capra . the traditional romanian dress that otherwise ha largely fallen out of use during the 20th ; century , is a popular ceremonial vestment worn on these festivity , especially in rural area . there are sacrifice of live pig during christmas and lamb during easter that ha required a special exemption from eu law after 2007 . in the easter , tradition such a easter egg are very common . on 1 ; march feature mrior gifting , which is a tradition that female are gifted with a type of talisman that is given for good luck . </s> romanian cuisine ha been influenced by austrian cuisine and german cuisine ( especially in the historical region that had been formerly administered by the habsburg monarchy ) , but also share some similarity with other cuisine in the balkan such a the greek cuisine , bulgarian cuisine , or serbian cuisine . ciorb includes a wide range of sour soup , while mititei , mmlig ( similar to polenta ) , and sarma ( food ) are featured commonly in main course . </s> pork , chicken , and beef are the preferred type of meat , but lamb and fish are also quite popular . certain traditional recipe are made in direct connection with the holiday : kofta , tob and tochitura at christmas ; drob , paska ( bread ) and cozonac at easter and other romanian holiday . uic is a strong plum brandy reaching a 70 % ; alcohol content which is the country 's traditional alcoholic beverage , taking a much a 75 % ; of the national crop ( romania is one of the list of country by plum production ) . traditional alcoholic beverage also include romanian wine , rakia , plinka and viinat , but beer in romania consumption ha increased dramatically over recent year . </s> <section_title_start> sports <section_title_end> </s> association football is the most popular sport in romania with over 219,000 registered player . the market for professional football in romania is roughly 740 ; million according to uefa . </s> the governing body is the romanian football federation , which belongs to uefa . the romania national football team played it first match in 1922 and is one of only four national team to have taken part in the first three fifa world cup , the other three being brazil , france , and belgium . overall , it ha played in seven world cup and had it most successful period during the 1990s , when it finished 6th at the 1994 fifa world cup , eventually being ranked 3rd by fifa in 1997. </s> the core player of this golden generation wa gheorghe hagi , who wa nicknamed `` maradona of the carpathians `` . other successful player include the european golden shoe winner : dudu georgescu , dorin mateu and rodion cmtaru , nicolae dobrin , ilie balaci , florea dumitrache , mihai mocanu , michael klein ( footballer , born 1959 ) , mircea rednic , cornel dinu , mircea lucescu , costic tefnescu , ion dumitru , lajos stmreanu , tefan same , lszl blni , anghel iordnescu , miodrag belodedici , helmuth duckadam , marius lctu , victor piurc and many others , and most recently gheorghe popescu , florin rducioiu , dorinel munteanu , dan petrescu , adrian mutu , cristian chivu , or cosmin contra . romania 's home ground is the arena naional in bucharest . </s> the most successful club is fcsb , who were the first eastern european team to win the uefa champion league in european cup 198586 , and were runner-up in european cup 198889 . they were also uefa europa league semi-finalists in 200506 uefa cup . fc dinamo bucureti reached the champion league semi-final in 198384 european cup and the uefa cup winner ' cup cup winner ' cup semi-final in 198990 european cup winner ' cup . other important romanian football club are fc rapid bucureti , fc uta arad , c universitatea craiova , fc petrolul ploieti , cfr cluj , fc astra giurgiu , and fc viitorul constana . </s> tennis is the second most popular sport . romania reached the davis cup final three time in 1969 , 1971 and 1972 . in single , ilie nstase wa the list of atp number 1 ranked single tennis player first year-end world number 1 in the atp ranking in 1973 , winning several grand slam ( tennis ) title . also virginia ruzici won the french open in 1978 , and wa runner-up in 1980 , simona halep won the french open in 2018 and the championship , wimbledon in 2019 after losing her first three grand slam final . she ha ended 2017 wta tour and 2018 wta tour a list of wta number 1 ranked tennis player wta 's world number 1 . and in double horia tecu won three grand slam and the atp final final . he wa world number 2 in 2015. </s> the second most popular team sport is team handball . the romania men 's national handball team men 's team won the world men 's handball championship in 1961 world men 's handball championship , 1964 world men 's handball championship , 1970 world men 's handball championship , 1974 world men 's handball championship making them the third most successful nation ever in the tournament . the romania woman 's national handball team woman 's team won the ihf world woman 's handball championship in 1962 world woman 's handball championship and have enjoyed more success than their male counterpart in recent year . in the club competition romanian team have won the ehf champion league a total of three time , csa steaua bucureti ( handball ) won in 196768 european cup ( handball ) a well a 197677 european cup ( handball ) and c dinamo bucureti ( men 's handball ) won in 196465 european cup ( handball ) . the most notable player include tefan birtalan , vasile stng ( all-time top scorer in the national team ) and gheorghe gruia who wa named the best player ever in 1992 . in present-day cristina neagu is the most notable player and ha a record four ihf world player of the year award . in woman 's handball , powerhouse csm bucureti ( woman 's handball ) lifted the woman 's ehf champion league trophy in 2016. </s> popular individual sport include combat sport , martial art , and swimming ( sport ) . in professional boxing , romania ha produced many world champion across the weight division internationally recognised by governing body . world champion include lucian bute , leonard doroftei , adrian diaconu , and mihai leu . another popular combat sport is kickboxing , which ha produced prominent practitioner including daniel ghi , and benjamin adegbuyi . </s> romania 's 306 all-time olympic game medal table all-time summer olympics medal would rank 12th most among all country , while it 89 gold medal would be 14th most . the 1984 summer olympics wa their most successful run , where they won 53 medal in total , 20 of them gold , ultimately placing 2nd to the host united state in the 1984 summer olympics medal table . amongst country who have never hosted the event themselves , they are second in the total number of medal earned . </s> artistic gymnastics is country 's major medal-producing sport , with olympic and sport icon nadia comneci becoming the first gymnast ever to score a perfect ten in an olympic event at the 1976 summer olympics . other romanian athlete who collected five gold medal like comneci are rower elisabeta lipa ( 1984-2004 ) and georgeta damian ( 2000-2008 ) . the romanian competitor have won gold medal in other olympic sport : athletics , canoeing , wrestling , shooting , fencing , swimming , weightlifting , boxing , and judo . </s> <section_title_start> see also
