some thirty year ' worth of conquest on the left bank of daugava were lost . in 2000 , the lithuanian and latvian parliament declared 22 september to be the day of baltic unity . </s> according to the legend , grand duke gediminas wa once hunting near the vilnia river ; tired after the successful hunt , he settled in for the night and dreamed of a huge iron wolf ( character ) standing on top a hill and howling a strong and loud a a hundred wolf . krivis ( pagan priest ) lizdeika interpreted the dream that the iron wolf represents vilnius castle . gediminas , obeying the will of god , built the city and gave it the name vilnius from the stream of the vilnia river . </s> in 1362 or 1363 , grand duke algirdas achieved a decisive victory in the battle of blue water against golden horde and stopped it further expansion in the present-day ukraine . the victory brought the city of kyiv and a large part of present-day ukraine , including sparsely populated podolia and dykra , under the control of the expanding grand duchy of lithuania . after taking kyiv , lithuania became a direct neighbor and rival of the grand duchy of moscow . </s> by the end of the 14th century , lithuania wa one of the largest country in europe and included present-day belarus , ukraine , and part of poland and russia . the geopolitical situation between the west and the east determined the multicultural and multi-confessional character of the grand duchy of lithuania . the ruling elite practised religious tolerance and chancery slavonic language wa used a an auxiliary language to the latin for official document . </s> in 1385 , the grand duke jogaila accepted poland 's offer to become it king . jogaila embarked on gradual christianization of lithuania and established a personal union between poland and lithuania . lithuania wa one of the last romuva ( religion ) area of europe to adopt christianity . </s> after two civil war , vytautas the great became the grand duke of lithuania in 1392 . during his reign , lithuania reached the peak of it territorial expansion , centralization of the state began , and the lithuanian nobility became increasingly prominent in state politics . in the great battle of the vorskla river in 1399 , the combined force of tokhtamysh and vytautas were defeated by the golden horde . thanks to close cooperation , the army of lithuania and poland achieved a victory over the teutonic knight in 1410 at the battle of grunwald , one of the largest battle of medieval europe . </s> in january 1429 , at the congress of lutsk vytautas received the title of king of lithuania with the backing of sigismund , holy roman emperor , but the envoy who were transporting the crown were stopped by polish magnate in autumn of 1430 . another crown wa sent , but vytautas died in the trakai island castle several day before it reached lithuania . he wa buried in the cathedral of vilnius . </s> after the death of jogaila and vytautas , the lithuanian nobility attempted to break the union between poland and lithuania , independently selecting grand duke from the jagiellon dynasty . but , at the end of the 15th century , lithuania wa forced to seek a closer alliance with poland when the growing power of the grand duchy of moscow threatened lithuania 's russian principality and sparked the muscovitelithuanian war and the livonian war . </s> on 8 september 1514 , battle of orsha between lithuanian , commanded by the hetmans of the polishlithuanian commonwealth konstanty ostrogski , and muscovite wa fought . according to rerum moscoviticarum commentarii by sigismund von herberstein , the primary source for information on the battle , the much smaller army of polandlithuania ( under 30,000 men ) defeated a force of 80,000 muscovite soldier , capturing their camp and commander . the battle destroyed a military alliance against lithuania and poland . thousand of muscovite were captured a prisoner and used a labourer in the list of palace and manor house in lithuania , while konstanty ostrogski delivered the captured muscovite flag to the cathedral of vilnius . </s> the livonian war wa ceased for ten year with a truce of yam-zapolsky signed on 15 january 1582 according to which the already polishlithuanian commonwealth recovered livonia , polotsk and velizh , but transferred velikiye luki to the tsardom of russia . the truce wa extended for twenty year in 1600 , when a diplomatic mission to moscow led by lew sapieha concluded negotiation with tsar boris godunov . the truce wa broken when polishmuscovite war ( 160518 ) . </s> <section_title_start> polishlithuanian commonwealth <section_title_end> </s> the polishlithuanian commonwealth wa created in 1569 by the union of lublin . a a member of the commonwealth , lithuania retained it institution , including a separate army , currency , and statutory law statute of lithuania . eventually polonization affected all aspect of lithuanian life : politics , language , culture , and national identity . from the mid-16th to the mid-17th century , culture , art , and education flourished , fueled by the renaissance and the protestant reformation . from 1573 , the king of poland and grand duke of lithuania were free election ( polish throne ) , who were granted ever increasing golden liberty . these liberty , especially the liberum veto , led to anarchy and the eventual dissolution of the state . </s> the commonwealth reached it polish golden age in the early 17th century . it powerful sejm wa dominated by noble who were reluctant to get involved in the thirty year ' war ; this neutrality spared the country from the ravage of a political-religious conflict that devastated most of contemporary europe . the commonwealth held it own against swedish empire , the tsardom of russia , and vassal of the ottoman empire , and even launched successful expansionism offensive against it neighbour . in polishmuscovite war ( 160518 ) during the time of trouble , commonwealth troop entered russia and managed to take moscow and hold it from 27 september 1610 to 4 november 1612 , when they were driven out polishmuscovite war ( 160518 ) # the war resume ( 1611 ) . </s> in 1655 , after the extinguishing battle of vilnius ( 1655 ) , for the first time in history the lithuanian capital vilnius wa taken by a foreign army . the russian army looted the city , splendid church , and manor . between 8,000 and 10,000 citizen were killed ; the city burned for 17 day . those who returned after the catastrophe could not recognise the city . the russian occupation of the grand duchy of lithuania lasted up to 1661 . many artefact and cultural heritage were either lost or looted , significant part of the state archive lithuanian metrica , collected since the 13th century , were lost and the rest wa moved out of the country . during the second northern war ( 16551661 ) , the lithuanian territory and economy were devastated by the swedish empire army . almost all territory of the grand duchy of lithuania wa occupied by swedish and russian army . this period is known a tvanas ( deluge ( history ) ) . </s> before it could fully recover , lithuania wa ravaged during the great northern war ( 17001721 ) . the war , great northern war plague outbreak , and great frost of 1709 caused the death of approximately 40 % of the country 's population . foreign power , especially russia , became dominant in the domestic politics of the commonwealth . numerous fraction among the nobility used the golden liberty to prevent any reform . </s> the constitution of 3 may 1791 wa adopted by the great sejm ( parliament ) of the polishlithuanian commonwealth trying to save the state . the legislation wa designed to redress the commonwealth 's political defect due to the system of golden liberty , also known a the `` noble ' democracy , `` had conferred disproportionate right on the nobility ( szlachta ) and over time had corrupted politics . the constitution sought to supplant the prevailing anarchy fostered by some of the country 's magnate of poland and lithuania with a more democratic constitutional monarchy . it introduced element of political equality between townspeople and nobility , and placed the peasant under the protection of the government , thus mitigating the worst abuse of serfdom . it banned parliamentary institution such a the liberum veto , which had put the sejm at the mercy of any deputy who could revoke all the legislation that had been passed by that sejm . it wa drafted in relation to a copy of the united state constitution . others have called it the world 's second-oldest codified national governmental constitution after the 1787 u.s. constitution . </s> <section_title_start> russian empire <section_title_end> </s> eventually , partition of poland in 1772 , 1792 , and 1795 by the russian empire , prussia , and the habsburg monarchy . </s> the largest area of lithuanian territory became part of the russian empire . after the unsuccessful november uprising and january uprising , the tsarist authority implemented a number of russification policy . in 1840 the statute of lithuania # third statute wa abolished . they lithuanian press ban , closed cultural and educational institution and made lithuania part of a new administrative region called northwestern krai . the russification failed owing to an extensive network of lithuanian book smuggler and secret lithuanian home schooling . </s> after the russo-turkish war ( 18771878 ) , when german diplomat assigned what were seen a russian spoil of war to turkey , the relationship between russia and the german empire became complicated . the russian empire resumed the construction of fortress at it western border for defence against a potential invasion from germany in the west . on 7 july 1879 the alexander ii of russia approved a proposal from the russian military leadership to build the largest `` first-class `` defensive structure in the entire state the kaunas fortress . large number of lithuanian went to the united state in 18671868 after a famine . </s> simonas daukantas promoted a return to lithuania 's pre-polishlithuanian commonwealth tradition , which he depicted a a golden age of lithuania and a renewal of the native culture , based on the lithuanian language and custom . with those idea in mind , he wrote already in 1822 a history of lithuania in lithuanian darbai senj lietuvi ir emaii ( the deed of ancient lithuanian and samogitians ) , though it wa not published at that time . a colleague of s. daukantas , teodor narbutt wrote in polish a voluminous ancient history of the lithuanian nation ( 18351841 ) , where he likewise expounded and expanded further on the concept of historic lithuania , whose day of glory had ended with the union of lublin in 1569 . narbutt , invoking german scholarship , pointed out the relationship between the lithuanian and sanskrit language . a lithuanian national revival , inspired by the ancient lithuanian history , language and culture , laid the foundation of the modern lithuanian nation and independent lithuania . </s> <section_title_start> 20th and 21st centuries <section_title_end> </s> <section_title_start> 19181939 <section_title_end> </s> a a result of the great retreat ( russian ) during world war i , germany occupied the entire territory of lithuania and courland by the end of 1915 . a new administrative entity , ober ost , wa established . lithuanian lost all political right they had gained : personal freedom wa restricted , and at the beginning , the lithuanian press wa banned . however , the lithuanian intelligentsia tried to take advantage of the existing geopolitical situation and began to look for opportunity to restore lithuania 's independence . on 1822 september 1917 , the vilnius conference elected the 20-member council of lithuania . the council adopted the act of independence of lithuania on 16 february 1918 which proclaimed the restoration of the independent state of lithuania governed by democratic principle , with vilnius a it capital . the state of lithuania which had been built within the framework of the act lasted from 1918 until 1940. </s> following the capitulation of germany in november 1918 , the first provisional constitution of lithuania wa adopted and the first government of prime minister augustinas voldemaras wa organized . at the same time , the army and other state institution began to be organized . lithuania fought lithuanian war of independence : lithuaniansoviet war who proclaimed the lithuanian soviet socialist republic ( 19181919 ) , against the west russian volunteer army , and polishlithuanian war . a a result of the staged eligowski 's mutiny in october 1920 , second polish republic took control of vilnius region and annexed it a wilno voivodeship ( 19261939 ) in 1922 . lithuania continued to claim vilnius a it de jure capital ( the de facto , provisional capital being kaunas ) and relation with poland remained particularly tense and hostile for the entire interwar period . in january 1923 , lithuania staged the klaipda revolt and captured klaipda region ( memel territory ) which wa detached from east prussia by the treaty of versailles . the region became an autonomous region of lithuania . </s> on 15 may 1920 , the first meeting of the democratically elected constituent assembly of lithuania took place . the document it adopted , i. e. the temporary ( 1920 ) and permanent ( 1922 ) constitution of lithuania , strove to regulate the life of the new state . land , finance , and educational reform started to be implemented . the currency of lithuania , the lithuanian litas , wa introduced . the vytautas magnus university wa opened . all major public institution had been established . a lithuania began to gain stability , foreign country started to recognize it . in 1921 lithuania wa admitted to the league of nation . </s> on 17 december 1926 , a military 1926 lithuanian coup d'tat coup d'tat took place , resulting in the replacement of the democratically elected government with a conservative authoritarian government led by antanas smetona . augustinas voldemaras wa appointed to form a government . the so-called authoritarian phase had begun strengthening the influence of one party , the lithuanian nationalist union , in the country . in 1927 , the seimas wa dissolved . a new constitution wa adopted in 1928 , which consolidated presidential power . gradually , opposition party were banned , censorship wa tightened , and the right of national minority were narrowed . </s> on 15 july 1933 , steponas darius and stasys girnas , lithuanian pilot , emigrant to the united state , made a significant flight in the aviation history . they flew across the atlantic ocean , covering a distance of without landing , in 37 hour and 11 minute ( ) . in term of comparison , a far a the distance of non-stop flight wa concerned , their result ranked second only to that of russell boardman and john polando . </s> the provisional capital kaunas , which wa nicknamed little paris , and the country itself had a western world standard of living with sufficiently high salary and low price . at the time , qualified worker there were earning very similar real wage a worker in germany , italy , switzerland and france , the country also had a surprisingly high rate of natural increase of 9.7 and the industrial production of lithuania increased by 160 % from 1913 to 1940. </s> the situation wa aggravated by the global economic crisis . the purchase price of agricultural product had declined significantly . in 1935 , farmer began strike in suvalkija and dzkija . in addition to economic one , political demand were made . the government cruelly suppressed the unrest . in the spring of 1936 , four peasant were sentenced to death for starting the riot . </s> <section_title_start> 19391944 <section_title_end> </s> on 20 march 1939 , after year of rising tension , lithuania wa handed an ultimatum by nazi germany demanding it relinquish the klaipda region . two day later , the lithuanian government accepted the ultimatum . when nazi germany and soviet union concluded the molotovribbentrop pact , lithuania wa initially assigned to the german sphere of influence but wa later transferred to the soviet sphere . at the outbreak of world war ii , lithuania declared neutral power during world war ii . </s> in october 1939 , lithuania wa forced to sign the sovietlithuanian mutual assistance treaty : five soviet military base with 20,000 troop were established in lithuania in exchange for vilnius , which the soviet invasion of poland . delayed by the winter war with finland , the 1940 soviet ultimatum to lithuania on 14 june 1940 . they demanded the replacement of the lithuanian government and that the red army be allowed into the country . the government decided that , with soviet base already in lithuania , armed resistance wa impossible and accepted the ultimatum . president smetona left the country , hoping to form a government in exile , while more than 200,000 soviet red army soldier crossed the belaruslithuania border . the next day , identical ultimatum were presented to latvia and estonia . the soviet occupation of the baltic state ( 1940 ) . the soviet followed semi-constitutional procedure for transforming the independent country into soviet republic and incorporating them into the soviet union . </s> vladimir dekanozov wa sent to supervise the formation of the puppet people 's government of lithuania people 's government and the rigged election to the people 's seimas . the lithuanian soviet socialist republic wa proclaimed on 21 july and accepted into the soviet union on 3 august . lithuania sovietization of the baltic state : political party and various organization ( except the communist party of lithuania ) were outlawed , some 12,000 people , including many prominent figure , were arrested and imprisoned in gulag a `` enemy of the people `` , larger private property wa nationalized , the lithuanian litas wa replaced by the soviet ruble , farm tax were increased by 50200 % , the lithuanian army wa transformed into the 29th rifle corp ( soviet union ) . on 1418 june 1941 , le than a week before the nazi invasion , some 17,000 lithuanian were deported to siberia , where many perished due to inhumane living condition ( see the june deportation ) . the occupation wa not recognized by western power and the lithuanian diplomatic service , based on pre-war consulate and legation , continued to represent independent lithuania until 1990. </s> when nazi germany operation barbarossa on 22 june 1941 , lithuanian began the anti-soviet june uprising in lithuania , organized by the lithuanian activist front . lithuanian proclaimed independence and organized the provisional government of lithuania . this government quickly self-disbanded . lithuania became part of the reichskommissariat ostland , german civil administration . </s> by 1 december 1941 , over 120,000 lithuanian jew , or 9195 % of lithuania 's pre-war jewish community , had been killed . nearly 100,000 jew , pole , russian and lithuanian were ponary massacre . however , thousand of lithuanian family risking their life also protected jew from the holocaust . israel ha recognized 893 lithuanian ( a of 1 january 2018 ) a righteous among the nation for risking their life to save jew during the holocaust . </s> approximately 13,000 men served in the lithuanian auxiliary police battalion . 10 of the 26 lithuanian auxiliary police battalion working with the nazi einsatzkommando , were involved in the mass killing . rogue unit organised by algirdas klimaitis and supervised by s brigadefhrer walter stahlecker started the kaunas pogrom in and around kaunas on 25 june 1941 . in 1941 , the lithuanian security police ( lietuvos saugumo policija ) , subordinate to nazi germany 's security police and nazi germany 's criminal police , wa created . the lietuvos saugumo policija targeted the communist underground . </s> a new occupation had begun . nationalized asset were not returned to the resident . some of them were forced to fight for nazi germany or were taken to german territory a forced labourer . jew people were herded into ghetto and gradually killed by shooting or sending them out to concentration camp . </s> <section_title_start> 19441990 <section_title_end> </s> after the retreat of the wehrmacht , the occupation and annexation of the baltic state by the soviet union ( 1944 ) in julyoctober 1944 . the deportation to siberia were resumed and lasted until the death of joseph stalin in 1953 . antanas sniekus , the leader of the communist party of lithuania from 1940 to 1974 , supervised the arrest and deportation . all lithuanian national symbol were banned . under the pretext of lithuania 's economic recovery , the moscow authority encouraged the migration of worker and other specialist to lithuania with the intention to further integrate lithuania into the soviet union and to develop the country 's industry . at the same time , lithuanian were lured to work in the ussr by promising them all the privilege of settling in a new place . </s> the second soviet occupation wa accompanied by the lithuanian partisan of the lithuanian population , which took place in 19441953 . it sought to restore an independent state of lithuania , to consolidate democracy by destroying communism in the country , returning national value and the freedom of religion . about 50,000 lithuanian took to the forest and fought soviet occupant with a gun in their hand . in the later stage of the partisan war , lithuanian formed the union of lithuanian freedom fighter and it leader jonas emaitis ( codename vytautas ) wa posthumously recognized a the president of lithuania . despite the fact that the guerrilla warfare did not achieve it goal of liberating lithuania and that it resulted in more than 20,000 death , the armed resistance de facto demonstrated that lithuania did not voluntarily join the ussr and it also legitimized the will of the people of lithuania to be independent . lithuanian court and the european court of human right both treat the soviet ' annihilation of the lithuanian partisan a a genocide . </s> even with the suppression of partisan resistance , the soviet government failed to stop the movement for the independence of lithuania . the underground dissident group were active publishing the underground press and catholic literature . the most active participant of the movement included vincentas sladkeviius , sigitas tamkeviius and nijol sadnait . in 1972 , after roma kalanta roma kalanta 's public self-immolation , the unrest in kaunas lasted for several day . </s> the lithuanian helsinki group , which wa founded in lithuania after the international conference in helsinki ( finland ) , where the post-wwii border were acknowledged , announced a declaration for lithuania 's independence on foreign radio station . the helsinki group informed the western world about the situation in the soviet lithuania and violation of human right . with the beginning of the increased openness and transparency in government institution and activity ( glasnost ) in the soviet union , on 3 june 1988 , the sjdis wa established in lithuania . very soon it began to seek country 's independence . vytautas landsbergis became movement 's leader . the supporter of sjdis joined movement 's group all over lithuania . on 23 august 1988 a big rally took place at the vingis park in vilnius . it wa attended by approx . 250,000 people . a year later , on 23 august 1989 commemorating the 50th anniversary of the molotovribbentrop pact molotov-ribbentrop pact and aiming to draw the attention of the whole world to the occupation of the baltic state , a political demonstration , the baltic way , wa organized . the event , led by sjdis , wa a human chain spanning across vilnius , riga and tallinn , indicating the desire of the people of lithuania , latvia , and estonia to break away from the soviet union . </s> <section_title_start> 1990present <section_title_end> </s> on 11 march 1990 , the supreme council reconstituent seimas announced the restoration of lithuania 's independence . lithuania became the first soviet occupied state to announce restitution of independence . on 20 april 1990 , the soviet imposed an blockade by ceasing to deliver supply of raw material ( primarily oil ) to lithuania . not only the domestic industry , but also the population started feeling the lack of fuel , essential good , and even hot water . although the blockade lasted for 74 day , lithuania did not renounce the declaration of independence . </s> gradually , economic relation had been restored . however , tension had peaked again in january 1991 . at that time , attempt were made to carry out a coup using the soviet armed force , the internal army of the ministry of internal affair and the ussr committee for state security ( kgb ) . because of the poor economic situation in lithuania , the force in moscow thought the coup d'tat would receive strong public support . </s> people from all over lithuania flooded to vilnius to defend their legitimately elected supreme council reconstituent seimas and independence . the coup ended with a few casualty of peaceful civilian and caused huge material loss . not a single person who defended seimas or other state institution used a weapon , but the soviet army did . soviet soldier killed 14 people and injured hundred . a large part of the lithuanian population participated in the january event ( lithuania ) . shortly after , on 11 february 1991 , the alingi voted to confirm that iceland 's 1922 recognition of lithuanian independence wa still in full effect , a it never formally recognized the soviet union 's control over lithuania , and that full diplomatic relation should be established a soon a possible . </s> on 31 july 1991 , soviet paramilitary killed seven lithuanian border guard on the belarusian border in what became known a the medininkai massacre . on 17 september 1991 , lithuania wa admitted to the united nation . </s> on 25 october 1992 the citizen of lithuania voted in a referendum to adopt the current constitution of lithuania . on 14 february 1993 , during the direct general election , algirdas brazauskas became the first president after the restoration of independence of lithuania . on 31 august 1993 the last unit of the soviet army left the territory of lithuania . since 29 march 2004 , lithuania ha been part of the nato . on 1 may 2004 , it became a fully-fledged member of the european union , and a member of the schengen agreement on 21 december 2007. </s> <section_title_start> geography <section_title_end> </s> lithuania is located in the baltic region of europe and cover an area of . it lie between latitude 53rd parallel north 53 and 57th parallel north 57 n , and mostly between longitude 21st meridian east 21 and 27th meridian east 27 e ( part of the curonian spit lie west of 21 ) . it ha around of sandy coastline , only about of which face the open baltic sea , le than the other two baltic sea country . the rest of the coast is sheltered by the curonian sand peninsula . lithuania 's major warm-water port , klaipda , lie at the narrow mouth of the curonian lagoon ( lithuanian : kuri marios ) , a shallow lagoon extending south to kaliningrad . the country 's main and largest river , the nemunas river , and some of it tributary carry international shipping . </s> lithuania lie at the edge of the north european plain . it landscape wa smoothed by the glacier of the last glacial period , and is a combination of moderate lowland and highland . it highest point is auktojas hill at in the eastern part of the country . the terrain feature list of lake in lithuania ( lake vitytis , for example ) and wetland , and a mixed forest zone cover over 33 % of the country . drkiai is the largest , tauragnas is the deepest and asveja is the longest lake in lithuania . </s> after a re-estimation of the boundary of the continent of europe in 1989 , jean-george affholder , a scientist at the institut gographique national ( france ) ( french national geographic institute ) , determined that the geographic centre of europe wa in lithuania , at , north of lithuania 's capital city of vilnius . affholder accomplished this by calculating the centre of gravity of the geography of europe of europe . </s> <section_title_start> climate <section_title_end> </s> lithuania ha a temperate climate with both maritime climate and continental climate influence . it is defined a [ continental climate humid continental ] ( dfb ) under the kppen climate classification ( but is close to oceanic climate in a narrow coastal zone ) . </s> average temperature on the coast are in january and in july . in vilnius the average temperature are in january and in july . during the summer , is common during the day while is common at night ; in the past , temperature have reached a high a . some winter can be very cold . occurs almost every winter . winter extreme are in coastal area and in the east of lithuania . </s> the average annual precipitation is on the coast , in the samogitia highland and in the eastern part of the country . snow occurs every year , it can snow from october to april . in some year sleet can fall in september or may . the growing season last 202 day in the western part of the country and 169 day in the eastern part . severe storm are rare in the eastern part of lithuania but common in the coastal area . </s> the longest record of measured temperature in the baltic area cover about 250 year . the data show warm period during the latter half of the 18th century , and that the 19th century wa a relatively cool period . an early 20th century warming culminated in the 1930s , followed by a smaller cooling that lasted until the 1960s . a warming trend ha persisted since then . </s> lithuania experienced a drought in 2002 , causing forest and peat bog fire . the country suffered along with the rest of northwestern europe during a heat wave in the summer of 2006. </s> <section_title_start> environment <section_title_end> </s> after the restoration of lithuania 's independence in 1990 , the aplinkos apsaugos statymas ( environmental protection act ) wa adopted already in 1992 . the law provided the foundation for regulating social relation in the field of environmental protection , established the basic right and obligation of legal and natural person in preserving the biodiversity inherent in lithuania , ecological system and the landscape . lithuania agreed to cut carbon emission by at least 20 % of 1990 level by the year 2020 and by at least 40 % by the year 2030 , together with all european union member . also , by 2020 at least 20 % ( 27 % by 2030 ) of country 's total energy consumption should be from the renewable energy source . in 2016 , lithuania introduced especially effective container deposit legislation , which resulted in collecting 92 % of all packaging in 2017. </s> lithuania doe not have high mountain and it landscape is dominated by blooming meadow , dense forest and fertile field of cereal . however it stand out by the abundance of [ which previously had castle where the ancient lithuanian burned altar for pagan god . lithuania is a particularly watered region with more than 3,000 lake , mostly in the northeast . the country is also drained by numerous river , most notably the longest nemunas ] . lithuania is home to two terrestrial ecoregions : [ [ central european mixed forest and sarmatic mixed forest . </s> forest ha long been one of the most important natural resource in lithuania . forest occupy one third of the country 's territory and timber-related industrial production account for almost 11 % industrial production in the country . lithuania ha five national park , 30 regional park , 402 nature reserve , 668 state-protected natural heritage object . </s> lithuania is ranked fifth , second to sweden ( first 3 place are not granted ) in climate change performance index ( ccpi ) . it had a 2019 forest landscape integrity index mean score of 1.62/10 , ranking it 162nd globally out of 172 country . </s> <section_title_start> biodiversity <section_title_end> </s> lithuanian ecosystem include natural and semi-natural ( forest , bog , wetland and meadow ) , and anthropogenic ( agrarian and urban ) ecosystem . among natural ecosystem , forest are particularly important to lithuania , covering 33 % of the country 's territory . wetland ( raised bog , fen , transitional mire , etc . ) cover 7.9 % of the country , with 70 % of wetland having been lost due to drainage and peat extraction between 1960 and 1980 . change in wetland plant community resulted in the replacement of moss and grass community by tree and shrub , and fen not directly affected by land reclamation have become drier a a result of a drop in the water table . there are 29,000 river with a total length of 64,000 ; km in lithuania , the nemunas river basin occupying 74 % of the territory of the country . due to the construction of dam , approximately 70 % of spawning site of potential catadromous fish specie have disappeared . in some case , river and lake ecosystem continue to be impacted by anthropogenic eutrophication . </s> agricultural land comprises 54 % of lithuania 's territory ( roughly 70 % of that is arable land and 30 % meadow and pasture ) , approximately 400,000 ha of agricultural land is not farmed , and act a an ecological niche for weed and invasive plant specie . habitat deterioration is occurring in region with very productive and expensive land a crop area are expanded . currently , 18.9 % of all plant specie , including 1.87 % of all known fungi specie and 31 % of all known specie of lichen , are listed in the list of extinct and endangered specie of lithuania . the list also contains 8 % of all fish specie . </s> the wildlife population have rebounded a the hunting became more restricted and urbanization allowed replanting forest ( forest already tripled in size since their low ) . currently , lithuania ha approximately 250,000 larger wild animal or 5 per each square kilometer . the most prolific large wild animal in every part of lithuania is the roe deer , with 120,000 of them . they are followed by boar ( 55,000 ) . other ungulate are the deer ( ~22,000 ) , fallow-deer ( ~21,000 ) and the largest one : moose ( ~7,000 ) . among the lithuanian predator , fox are the most common ( ~27,000 ) . wolf are , however , more ingrained into the mythology a there are just 800 in lithuania . even rarer are the lynx ( ~200 ) . the large animal mentioned above exclude the rabbit , ~200,000 of which may live in the lithuanian forest . </s> <section_title_start> politics <section_title_end> </s> <section_title_start> government <section_title_end> </s> since lithuania declared the restoration of it independence on 11 march 1990 , it ha maintained strong democratic tradition . it held it first independent general election on 25 october 1992 , in which 56.75 % of voter supported the constitution of lithuania . there were intense debate concerning the constitution , particularly the role of the president . a 1992 lithuanian presidency referendum wa held on 23 may 1992 to gauge public opinion on the matter , and 41 % of voter supported the restoration of the president of lithuania . through compromise , a semi-presidential system wa agreed on . </s> the lithuanian [ of state ] is the president , directly elected for a five-year term and serving a maximum of two term . the president oversees foreign affair and national security , and is the commander-in-chief of the military . the president also appoints the prime minister of lithuania and , on the latter 's nomination , the rest of the cabinet , a well a a number of other top civil servant and the judge for all court . the current lithuanian head of state , gitana nausda wa 2019 lithuanian presidential election by unanimously winning in all municipality of lithuania . </s> the judge of the constitutional court of lithuania ( konstitucinis teismas ) serve nine-year term . they are appointed by the president , the chairman of the seimas , and the chairman of the supreme court , each of whom appoint three judge . the unicameral lithuanian parliament , the seimas , ha 141 member who are elected to four-year term . 71 of the member of it member are elected in single-member constituency , and the others in a nationwide vote by proportional representation . a party must receive at least 5 % of the national vote to be eligible for any of the 70 national seat in the seimas . </s> <section_title_start> political party and elections <section_title_end> </s> lithuania wa one of the first country in the world to woman 's suffrage in the election . lithuanian woman were allowed to vote by the constitution of lithuania # interwar constitution and used their newly granted right for the first time in 1919 . by doing so , lithuania allowed it earlier than such democratic country a the united state ( 1920 ) , france ( 1945 ) , feminism in greece ( 1952 ) , switzerland ( 1971 ) . </s> lithuania exhibit a fragmented multi-party system , with a number of small party in which coalition government are common . ordinary election to the seimas take place on the second sunday of october every four year . to be eligible for election , candidate must be at least 25 year old on the election day , not under allegiance to a foreign state and permanently reside in lithuania . person serving or due to serve a sentence imposed by the court 65 day before the election are not eligible . also , judge , citizen performing military service , and serviceman of professional military service and official of statutory institution and establishment may not stand for election . homeland union lithuanian christian democrat won the 2020 lithuanian parliamentary election and gained 50 of 141 seat in the parliament . </s> the president of lithuania is the head of state of the country , elected to a five-year term in a majority vote . election take place on the last sunday no more than two month before the end of current presidential term . to be eligible for election , candidate must be at least 40 year old on the election day and reside in lithuania for at least three year , in addition to satisfying the eligibility criterion for a member of the parliament . same president may serve for not more than two term . gitana nausda ha won the most recent election a an independent candidate in 2019 lithuanian presidential election . </s> each municipality in lithuania is governed by a municipal council and a mayor , who is a member of the municipal council . the number of member , elected on a four-year term , in each municipal council depends on the size of the municipality and varies from 15 ( in municipality with fewer than 5,000 resident ) to 51 ( in municipality with more than 500,000 resident ) . 1,524 municipal council member were elected in 2015 . member of the council , with the exception of the mayor , are elected using proportional representation . starting with 2015 , the mayor is elected directly by the majority of resident of the municipality . social democratic party of lithuania won most of the position in the 2015 election ( 372 municipal council seat and 16 mayor ) . </s> a of 2019 , the number of seat in the european parliament allocated to lithuania wa 11 . ordinary election take place on a sunday on the same day a in other eu country . the vote is open to all citizen of lithuania , a well a citizen of other eu country that permanently reside in lithuania , who are at least 18 year old on the election day . to be eligible for election , candidate must be at least 21 year old on the election day , citizen of lithuania or citizen of another eu country permanently residing in lithuania . candidate are not allowed to stand for election in more than one country . person serving or due to serve a sentence imposed by the court 65 day before the election are not eligible . also , judge , citizen performing military service , and serviceman of professional military service and official of statutory institution and establishment may not stand for election . six political party and one committee representative gained seat in the 2019 european parliament election in lithuania . </s> <section_title_start> law and law enforcement <section_title_end> </s> after regaining of independence in 1990 , the largely modified soviet legal code were in force for about a decade . the current constitution of lithuania wa adopted on 25 october 1992 . in 2001 , the civil code of lithuania wa passed in seimas . it wa succeeded by the criminal code and criminal procedure code in 2003 . the approach to the criminal law is inquisitorial , a opposed to adversarial system ; it is generally characterised by an insistence on formality and rationalisation , a opposed to practicality and informality . normative legal act enters into force on the next day after it publication in the teiss akt registras , unless it ha a later entry into force date . </s> the european union law is an integral part of the lithuanian legal system since 1 may 2004. </s> lithuania , after breaking away from the soviet union had a difficult crime situation , however the lithuanian law enforcement agency eliminated many criminal over the year , making lithuania a reasonably safe country . crime in lithuania ha been declining rapidly . law enforcement in lithuania is primarily the responsibility of local lietuvos policija ( lithuanian police ) commissariat . they are supplemented by the lietuvos policijos antiteroristini operacij rinktin ara ( anti-terrorist operation team of the lithuanian police ara ) , lietuvos kriminalins policijos biuras ( lithuanian criminal police bureau ) , lietuvos policijos kriminalistini tyrim centras ( lithuanian police forensic research center ) and lietuvos keli policijos tarnyba ( lithuanian road police service ) . </s> in 2017 , there were 63,846 crime registered in lithuania . of these , theft comprised a large part with 19,630 case ( 13.2 % le than in 2016 ) . while 2,835 crime were very hard and hard ( crime that may result in more than six year imprisonment ) , which is 14.5 % le than in 2016 . totally , 129 homicide or attempted homicide occurred ( 19.9 % le than in 2016 ) , while serious bodily harm wa registered 178 time ( 17.6 % le than in 2016 ) . another problematic crime contraband case also decreased by 27.2 % from 2016 number . meanwhile , crime in electronic data and information technology security field noticeably increased by 26.6 % . in the 2013 special eurobarometer , 29 % of lithuanian said that corruption affect their daily life ( eu average 26 % ) . moreover , 95 % of lithuanian regarded corruption a widespread in their country ( eu average 76 % ) , and 88 % agreed that bribery and the use of connection is often the easiest way of obtaining certain public service ( eu average 73 % ) . though , according to local branch of transparency international , corruption level have been decreasing over the past decade . </s> capital punishment in lithuania wa suspended in 1996 and fully eliminated in 1998 . lithuania ha the highest number of prison inmate in the eu . according to scientist gintautas sakalauskas , this is not because of a high criminality rate in the country , but due to lithuania 's high repression level and the lack of trust of the convicted , who are frequently sentenced to a jail imprisonment . </s> <section_title_start> administrative divisions <section_title_end> </s> the current system of administrative division wa established in 1994 and modified in 2000 to meet the requirement of the european union . the country 's county of lithuania ( lithuanian : singular apskritis , plural apskritys ) are subdivided into municipality of lithuania ( lithuanian : singular savivaldyb , plural savivaldybs ) , and further divided into 500 eldership of lithuania ( lithuanian : singular seninija , plural seninijos ) . </s> municipality have been the most important unit of administration in lithuania since the system of county governor ( lithuania ) ( apskrities virininkas ) wa dissolved in 2010 . some municipality are historically called `` district municipality `` ( often shortened to `` district `` ) , while others are called `` city municipality `` ( sometimes shortened to `` city `` ) . each ha it own elected government . the election of municipality council originally occurred every three year , but now take place every four year . the council appoints elder ( administrative title ) to govern the eldership . mayor have been directly elected since 2015 ; prior to that , they were appointed by the council . </s> eldership , numbering over 500 , are the smallest administrative unit and do not play a role in national politics . they provide necessary local public servicesfor example , registering birth and death in rural area . they are most active in the social sector , identifying needy individual or family and organizing and distributing welfare and other form of relief . some citizen feel that eldership have no real power and receive too little attention , and that they could otherwise become a source of local initiative for addressing rural problem . </s> <section_title_start> foreign relations <section_title_end> </s> lithuania became a member of the united nation on 18 september 1991 , and is a signatory to a number of it organization and other international agreement . it is also a member of the european union , the council of europe , organization for security and cooperation in europe , a well a nato and it adjunct north atlantic coordinating council . lithuania gained membership in the world trade organization on 31 may 2001 , and joined the oecd on 5 july 2018 , while also seeking membership in other western organization . </s> lithuania ha established diplomatic relation with 149 country . </s> in 2011 , lithuania hosted the organization for security and co-operation in europe ministerial council meeting . during the second half of 2013 , lithuania assumed the role of the presidency of the council of the european union . </s> lithuania is also active in developing cooperation among northern european country . it ha been a member of the baltic council since it establishment in 1993 . the baltic council , located in tallinn , is a permanent organisation of international cooperation that operates through the baltic assembly and the baltic council of minister . </s> lithuania also cooperates with nordic and the two other baltic country through the nb8 format . a similar format , nb6 , unites nordic and baltic member of eu . nb6 's focus is to discus and agree on position before presenting them to the council of the european union and at the meeting of eu foreign affair minister . </s> the council of the baltic sea state ( cbss ) wa established in copenhagen in 1992 a an informal regional political forum . it main aim is to promote integration and to close contact between the region 's country . the member of cbss are iceland , sweden , denmark , norway , finland , germany , lithuania , latvia , estonia , poland , russia , and the european commission . it observer state are belarus , france , italy , netherlands , romania , slovakia , spain , the united state , the united kingdom , and ukraine . </s> the nordic council and lithuania engage in political cooperation to attain mutual goal and to determine new trend and possibility for joint cooperation . the council 's information office aim to disseminate nordic country concept and to demonstrate and promote nordic cooperation . </s> lithuania , together with the five nordic country and the two other baltic country , is a member of the nordic investment bank nordic investment bank ( nib ) and cooperates in it nordplus programme , which is committed to education . </s> the baltic development forum ( bdf ) is an independent nonprofit organization that unites large company , city , business association and institution in the baltic sea region . in 2010 the bdf 's 12th summit wa held in vilnius . </s> poland wa highly supportive of lithuanian independence , despite lithuania 's lithuanization of it pole in lithuania . the former solidarity ( polish trade union ) leader and polish president lech wasa criticised the government of lithuania over discrimination against the polish minority and rejected lithuania 's order of vytautas the great . lithuania maintains greatly warm mutual relation with georgia ( country ) and strongly support it european union and nato aspiration . during the russo-georgian war in 2008 , when the russian troop were occupying the territory of georgia and approaching towards the georgian capital tbilisi , president valdas adamkus , together with the polish and ukrainian president , went to tbilisi by answering to the georgian request of the international assistance . shortly , lithuanian and the catholic church in lithuania also began collecting financial support for the war victim . </s> in 20042009 , dalia grybauskait served a european commissioner for financial programming and the budget within the jos manuel barroso-led commission . </s> in 2013 , lithuania wa elected to the united nation security council for a two-year term , becoming the first baltic state country elected to this post . during it membership , lithuania actively supported ukraine and often condemned russia for the russian military intervention in ukraine ( 2014present ) , immediately earning vast ukrainian esteem . a the war in donbas progressed , president dalia grybauskait ha compared the russian president vladimir putin to josef stalin and to adolf hitler , she ha also called russia a `` terrorist state `` . </s> in 2018 lithuania , along with latvia and estonia were awarded the for their exceptional model of democratic development and contribution to peace in the continent . in 2019 lithuania condemned the 2019 turkish offensive into north-eastern syria turkish offensive into north-eastern syria . </s> <section_title_start> military <section_title_end> </s> the lithuanian armed force is the name for the unified armed force of lithuanian land force , lithuanian air force , lithuanian naval force , lithuanian special operation force and other unit : logistics command , training and doctrine command , headquarters battalion , military police ( lithuania ) . directly subordinated to the chief of defence are the special operation force and military police . the reserve force are under command of the lithuanian national defence volunteer force . </s> the lithuanian armed force consist of some 17,000 active personnel , which may be supported by reserve force . compulsory conscription ended in 2008 but wa reintroduced in 2015 . the lithuanian armed force currently have deployed personnel on international mission in afghanistan , kosovo , mali and somalia . </s> lithuania became a full member of nato in march 2004 . fighter jet of nato member are deployed in zokniai airport and baltic air policing . </s> since the summer of 2005 lithuania ha been part of the international security assistance force in afghanistan ( isaf ) , leading a provincial reconstruction team ( prt ) in the town of chaghcharan in the province of ghor . the prt includes personnel from denmark , iceland and the u . there are also lithuanian special operation force unit in afghanistan , placed in kandahar province . since joining international operation in 1994 , lithuania ha lost two soldier : lt. normundas valteris fell in bosnia , a his patrol vehicle drove over a mine . sgt . arnas jarmalaviius wa fatally wounded during an attack on the camp of his provincial reconstruction team in afghanistan . </s> the lithuanian national defence policy aim to guarantee the preservation of the independence and sovereignty of the state , the integrity of it land , territorial water and airspace , and it constitutional order . it main strategic goal are to defend the country 's interest , and to maintain and expand the capability of it armed force so they may contribute to and participate in the mission of nato and european union member state . </s> the ministry of defense of the republic of lithuania is responsible for combat force , search and rescue , and intelligence operation . the 5,000 state border guard service ( lithuania ) fall under the interior ministry 's supervision and are responsible for border protection , passport and custom duty , and share responsibility with the lithuanian naval force for smuggling and drug trafficking interdiction . a special security department handle vip protection and communication security . in 2015 national cyber security centre of lithuania wa created . paramilitary organisation lithuanian rifleman 's union act a civilian self-defence institution . </s> according to nato , in 2017 lithuania allocated 1.77 % of it gross domestic product to the national defense . for a long time lithuania lagged behind nato ally in term of defense spending , but in recent year it ha begun to rapidly increase the funding . in 2018 lithuania intends to allocate 2.06 % of it gross domestic product to the defense sector and reach the required funding standard for nato . </s> <section_title_start> economy <section_title_end> </s> lithuania ha open and mixed economy that is classified a [ economy ] by the world bank . </s> according to data from 2016 , the three largest sector in lithuanian economy are service ( 68.3 % of gdp ) , industry ( 28.5 % ) and agriculture ( 3.3 % ) . world economic forum world economic forum 's global competitiveness report rank lithuania 41st ( of 137 ranked country ) . </s> lithuania joined nato in 2004 , eu in 2004 , schengen area in 2007 and oecd in 2018. </s> on 1 january 2015 , euro became the national currency replacing litas at the rate of eur 1.00 = ltl 3.45280. </s> agricultural product and food made 18.3 % , chemical product and plastic 17.8 % , machinery and appliance 15.8 % , mineral product 14.7 % , wood and furniture 12.5 % of export . according to data from 2016 , more than half of all lithuanian export go to 7 country including russia ( 14 % ) , latvia ( 9,9 % ) , poland ( 9,1 % ) , germany ( 7,7 % ) , estonia ( 5,3 % ) , sweden ( 4,8 % ) and united kingdom ( 4,3 % ) . export equaled 81.31 percent of lithuania 's gdp in 2017. </s> lithuanian gdp experienced very high real growth rate for decade up to 2009 , peaking at 11.1 % in 2007 . a a result , the country wa often termed a a baltic tiger . however , in 2009 due to a financial crisis of 20072008 marked experienced a drastic decline gdp contracted by 14.9 % and unemployment rate reached 17.8 % in 2010 . after the decline of 2009 , lithuanian annual economic growth ha been much slower compared to pre-2009 year . according to imf , financial condition are conducive to growth and financial soundness indicator remain strong . the public debt ratio in 2016 fell to 40 percent of gdp , to compare with 42.7 in 2015 ( before global finance crisis 15 percent of gdp in 2008 ) . </s> on average , more than 95 % of all foreign direct investment in lithuania come from european union country . sweden is historically the largest investor with 20 % 30 % of all fdi in lithuania . fdi into lithuania spiked in 2017 , reaching it highest ever recorded number of greenfield investment project . in 2017 , lithuania wa third country , after ireland and singapore by the average job value of investment project . </s> the u wa the leading source country in 2017 , 24.59 % of total fdi . next up are germany and the uk , each representing 11.48 % of total project number . based on the eurostat 's data , in 2017 , the value of lithuanian export recorded the most rapid growth not only in the baltic country , but also across europe , which wa 16.9 per cent . </s> in the period between 2004 and 2016 , one out of five lithuanian left the country , mostly because of insufficient income situation or seeking the new experience and study abroad . long term emigration and economy growth ha resulted in noticeable shortage on the labour market and growth in salary being larger than growth in labour efficiency . unemployment rate in 2017 wa 8.1 % . </s> a of 2019 , lithuanian mean wealth per adult is usd $ 50,254 , while total national wealth is $ 115 billion . a of 2020 , the average gross ( pre-tax ) monthly salary in lithuania is 1,455 euro translating to 928 euro net ( after tax ) or around u $ 1,125 , while average pension is around 400 euro per month . list of country by average wage adjusted for purchasing power parity , is usd $ 2,202 per month , one of the lowest in eu . although , cost of living in the country also is sufficiently le with the price level for [ final consumption expenditure ] ( hfce ) 63 , being 39 % lower than eu average 102 in 2016. </s> lithuania ha a flat tax rate rather than a graduated tax . according to eurostat , the personal income tax ( 15 % ) and corporate tax ( 15 % ) rate in lithuania are among the lowest in the eu . the country ha the lowest implicit rate of tax on capital ( 9.8 % ) in the eu . corporate tax rate in lithuania is 15 % and 5 % for small business . 7 free economic zone are operating in lithuania . </s> information technology production is growing in the country , reaching 1.9 billion euro in 2016 . in 2017 only , 35 </s> fintech company came to lithuania a result of lithuanian government and bank of lithuania simplified procedure for obtaining licence for the activity of e-money and payment institution . europe 's first international blockchain centre launched in vilnius in 2018 . lithuania ha granted a total of 39 e-money license , second in the eu only to the u.k. with 128 license . in 2018 google set up a payment company in lithuania . </s> <section_title_start> companies <section_title_end> </s> biggest company in lithuania in 2018 , by revenue : </s> <section_title_start> agriculture <section_title_end> </s> agriculture in lithuania date to the neolithic period , about 3,000 to 1,000 before christ . it ha been one of lithuania 's most important occupation for many century . lithuania 's accession to the european union in 2004 ushered in a new agricultural era . the eu pursues a very high standard of food safety and purity . in 1999 , the seimas ( parliament ) of lithuania adopted a law on product safety , and in 2000 it adopted a law on food . the reform of the agricultural market ha been carried out on the basis of these two law . </s> in 2016 , agricultural production wa made for 2.29 billion euro in lithuania . cereal crop occupied the largest part of it ( 5709,7 ton ) , other significant type were sugar beet ( 933,9 ton ) , rapeseed ( 392,5 ton ) and potato ( 340,2 ton ) . product for 4385,2 million euro were exported from lithuania to the foreign market , of which product for 3165,2 million euro were lithuanian origin . export of agricultural and food product accounted for 19.4 % of all export of good from the country . </s> organic farming is constantly becoming more popular in lithuania . the status of organic grower and producer in the country is granted by the public body ekoagros . in 2016 , there were 2539 such farm that occupied 225541,78 hectare . of these , 43,13 % were cereal , 31,22 % were perennial grass , 13,9 % were leguminous crop and 11,75 % were others . </s> <section_title_start> science and technology <section_title_end> </s> foundation of the university of vilnius in 1579 wa a major factor of establishing local scientist community in lithuania and making connection with other university and scientist of europe . georg forster , jean-emmanuel gilibert , johann peter frank and many other visiting scientist have worked at university of vilnius . </s> lithuanian bajoras and grand duchy of lithuania artillery expert kazimieras simonaviius is a pioneer of rocketry , who ha published artis magnae artilleriae in 1650 that for over two century wa used in europe a a basic artillery manual and contains a large chapter on caliber , construction , production and property of rocket ( for military and civil purpose ) , including multistage rocket , rocket battery , and rocket with delta wing stabilizer ( aircraft ) . a botanist jurgis pabra ( 1771-1849 ) , created first systematic guide of lithuanian flora taislius auguminis ( botany ) , written in samogitian dialect , the latin-lithuanian dictionary of plant name , first lithuanian textbook of geography . </s> during the interwar period humanitarian and social scientist emerged such a vasily seseman , levas karsavina , micha pius rmer . </s> due to the world war , lithuanian science and scientist suffered heavily from the occupant , however some of them reached a world-class achievement in their lifetime . most notably , antanas gustaitis , vytautas graiinas , marija gimbutas , birut galdikas , a. j. klior , algirdas julius greimas , medieval study jurgis baltruaitis ( son ) , algirdas antanas aviienis . </s> jonas kubilius , long-term rector of the university of vilnius is known for work in probabilistic number theory , kubilius model , theorem of kubilius and turnkubilius inequality bear his name . jonas kubilius successfully resisted attempt to russify the university of vilnius . </s> nowadays , the country is among moderate innovator group in the international innovation index . </s> and in the european innovation scoreboard ranked 15th among eu country . laser and biotechnology are flagship field of the lithuanian science and high tech industry . lithuanian `` viesos konversija `` ( light conversion ) ha developed a femtosecond laser system that ha 80 % marketshare worldwide , and is used in dna research , ophthalmological surgery , nanotech industry and science . vilnius university laser research center ha developed one of the most powerful femtosecond laser in the world dedicated primarily to oncology . in 1963 , vytautas straiys and his coworkers created vilnius photometric system that is used in astronomy . noninvasive intracranial pressure and blood flow measuring device were developed by kaunas university of technology scientist a. ragauskas . k.pyragas contributed to control of chaos with his way of delayed feedback control pyragas method . kavli prize laureate virginijus iknys is known for his discovery in crispr field invention of crispr-cas9 . </s> lithuania ha launched three satellite to space : litsat-1 , lituanica sat-1 and lituanicasat-2 . lithuanian museum of ethnocosmology and moltai astronomical observatory is located in kulionys . 15 r & d institution are member of lithuanian space association ; lithuania is a cooperating state with european space agency . rimantas stankeviius is the only ethnically lithuanian astronaut . </s> lithuania in 2018 became associated member state of cern . two cern incubator in vilnius and kaunas will be hosted . </s> most advanced scientific research in lithuania is being conducted at the life science center , center for physical science and technology . </s> a of 2016 calculation , yearly growth of lithuania 's biotech and life science sector wa 22 % over the past 5 year . 16 academic institution , 15 r & d centre ( science park and innovation valley ) and more than 370 manufacturer operate in the lithuanian life science and biotech industry . </s> in 2008 the valley development programme wa started aiming to upgrade lithuanian scientific research infrastructure and encourage business and science cooperation . five r & d valley were launched jrinis ( maritime technology ) , nemunas ( agro , bioenergy , forestry ) , saultekis ( laser and light , semiconductor ) , santara ( biotechnology , medicine ) , santaka ( sustainable chemistry and pharmacy ) . lithuanian innovation center is created to provide support for innovation and research institution . </s> <section_title_start> tourism <section_title_end> </s> statistic of 2016 showed that 1.49 million tourist from foreign country visited lithuania and spent at least one night in the country . the largest number of tourist came from germany ( 174,8 thousand ) , belarus ( 171,9 thousand ) , russia ( 150,6 thousand ) , poland ( 148,4 thousand ) , latvia ( 134,4 thousand ) , ukraine ( 84,0 thousand ) , and the united kingdom ( 58,2 thousand ) . </s> the total contribution of travel & tourism to country gdp wa eur 2,005.5mn , 5.3 % of gdp in 2016 , and is forecast to rise by 7.3 % in 2017 , and to rise by 4.2 % pa to eur 3,243.5mn , 6.7 % of gdp in 2027 . hot air ballooning is very popular in lithuania , especially in vilnius and trakai . bicycle tourism is growing , especially in lithuanian seaside cycle route . eurovelo route ev10 , ev11 , ev13 go through lithuania . total length of bicycle track amount to </s> 3769 ; km ( of which 1988 ; km is asphalt pavement ) . </s> nemunas delta regional park and lake uvintas are known for birdwatching . </s> domestic tourism ha been on the rise a well . currently there are up to 1000 place of attraction in lithuania . most tourist visit the big citiesvilnius , klaipda , and kaunas , seaside resort , such a neringa municipality , palanga , and spa town druskininkai , birtonas . </s> <section_title_start> infrastructure <section_title_end> </s> <section_title_start> communication <section_title_end> </s> lithuania ha a well developed communication infrastructure . the country ha 2,8 million citizen and 5 million sim card . the largest lte ( 4g ) mobile network cover 97 % of lithuania 's territory . usage of fixed phone line ha been rapidly decreasing due to rapid expansion of mobile-cellular service . </s> in 2017 , lithuania wa top 30 in the world by average mobile broadband speed and top 20 by average fixed broadband speed . </s> lithuania wa also top 7 in 2017 in the list of country by 4g lte penetration . in 2016 , lithuania wa ranked 17th in united nation ' e-participation index . </s> there are four tier iii datacenters in lithuania . </s> lithuania is 44th globally ranked country on data center density according to cloudscene . </s> long-term project ( 20052013 ) development of rural area broadband network ( rain ) wa started with the objective to provide resident , state and municipal authority and business with fibre-optic broadband access in rural area . rain infrastructure allows 51 communication operator to provide network service to their client . the project wa funded by the european union and the lithuanian government . 72 % of lithuanian household have access to internet , a number which in 2017 wa among eu 's lowest and in 2016 ranked 97th by cia world factbook . number of household with internet access is expected to increase and reach 77 % by 2021 . almost 50 % of lithuanian had smartphones in 2016 , a number that is expected to increase to 65 % by 2022. </s> lithuania ha the highest ftth ( fiber to the home ) penetration rate in europe ( 36.8 % in september 2016 ) according to ftth council europe . </s> <section_title_start> transport <section_title_end> </s> lithuania received it first railway connection in the middle of the 19th century , when the warsaw saint petersburg railway wa constructed . it included a stretch from daugavpils via vilnius and kaunas to virbalis . the first and only still operating kaunas railway tunnel wa completed in 1860. </s> lithuanian railway ' main network consists of of russian gauge railway of which are electrified . this railway network is incompatible with european standard gauge and requires train switching . however , lithuanian railway network also ha of standard gauge line . more than half of all inland freight transported in lithuania is carried by rail . the trans-european standard gauge rail baltica railway , linking helsinkitallinnrigakaunaswarsaw and continuing on to berlin is under construction . in 2017 , lietuvos geleinkeliai , a company that operates most railway line in lithuania , received eu penalty for breaching eu 's antitrust law and restricting competition . </s> transportation is the third largest sector in lithuanian economy . lithuanian transport company drew attention in 2016 and 2017 with huge and record-breaking order of truck . almost 90 % of commercial truck traffic in lithuania is international transport , the highest of any eu country . </s> lithuania ha an extensive network of motorway . wef grade lithuanian road at 4,7 / 7,0 and lithuanian road authority ( lakd ) at 6,5 / 10,0. </s> the port of klaipda is the only commercial cargo port in lithuania . in 2011 45.5 million ton of cargo were handled ( including bting oil terminal figure ) port of klaipda is outside of eu 's 20 largest port , but it is the eighth largest port in the baltic sea region </s> with ongoing expansion plan . </s> vilnius international airport is the largest airport in lithuania , 91st busiest airport in europe ( list of the busiest airport in europe eu 's 100 largest airport ) . it served 3.8 million passenger in 2016 . other international airport include kaunas airport , palanga international airport and iauliai international airport . kaunas airport is also a small commercial cargo airport which started regular commercial cargo traffic in 2011 . the inland river cargo port in marvel , linking kaunas and klaipda , received first cargo in 2019. </s> <section_title_start> water supply and sanitation <section_title_end> </s> lithuania ha one of the largest fresh water supply , compared with other country in europe . lithuania and denmark are the only country in europe , which are fully equipped with fresh groundwater . lithuanian consume about 0.5 million cubic meter of water per day , which is only 1214 percent of all explored fresh groundwater resource . water quality in the country is very high and is determined by the fact that drinking water come from deep layer that are protected from pollution on the surface of the earth . drilling depth usually reach 3050 meter , but in klaipda region it even reach 250 meter . consequently , lithuania is one of very few european country where groundwater is used for centralized water supply . with a large underground fresh water reserve , lithuania export mineral-rich water to other country . approved mineral water quantity is about 2.7 million cubic meter per year , while production is only 45 percent of all mineral water resource . </s> vilnius is the only baltic capital that us centralized water supplying from deep water spring , which are protected from pollution and ha no nitrate or nitrite that are harmful to the human body . water is cleaned without chemical in lithuania . about 20 % of the consumed water in the state is a non-filtered very high quality water . </s> <section_title_start> energy <section_title_end> </s> systematic diversification of energy import and resource is lithuania 's key energy strategy . long-term aim were defined in national energy independence strategy in 2012 by lietuvos seimas . it wa estimated that strategic energy independence initiative will cost 6.37.8 billion eur in total and provide annual saving of 0.91.1 billion eur . </s> after the decommissioning of the ignalina nuclear power plant , lithuania turned from electricity exporter to electricity importer . unit no . 1 wa closed in december 2004 , a a condition of lithuania 's entry into the european union ; unit no . 2 wa closed down on 31 december 2009 . proposal have been made to construct a new visaginas nuclear power plant in lithuania . however , 2012 lithuanian nuclear power referendum a non-binding referendum held in october 2012 clouded the prospect for the visaginas project , a 63 % of voter said no to a new nuclear power plant . </s> the country 's main primary source of electrical power is elektrnai power plant . other primary source of lithuania 's electrical power are kruonis pumped storage plant and kaunas hydroelectric power plant . kruonis pumped storage plant is the only in the baltic state power plant to be used for regulation of the power system 's operation with generating capacity of 900 mw for at least 12 hour . , 66 % of electrical power wa imported . first geothermal heating plant ( klaipda geothermal demonstration plant ) in the baltic sea region wa built in 2004. </s> lithuaniasweden submarine electricity interconnection nordbalt and lithuaniapoland electricity interconnection litpol link were launched at the end of 2015. </s> in order to break down gazprom 's monopoly in natural gas market of lithuania , first large scale lng import terminal ( klaipda lng fsru ) in the baltic region wa built in port of klaipda in 2014 . the klaipda lng terminal wa called independence , thus emphasising the aim to diversify energy market of lithuania . norvegian company equinor supply of natural gas annually from 2015 until 2020 . the terminal is able to meet the lithuania 's demand 100 percent , and latvia 's and estonia 's national demand 90 percent in the future . </s> gas interconnection polandlithuania ( gipl ) , also known a lithuaniapoland pipeline , is a proposed natural gas pipeline interconnection between lithuania and poland that is expected to be finished by 2019 . in 2018 synchronising the baltic state ' electricity grid with the synchronous grid of continental europe ha started . </s> in 2016 , 20,8 % of electricity consumed in lithuania came from renewable source . </s> <section_title_start> demographics <section_title_end> </s> since the neolithic period the native inhabitant of the lithuanian territory have not been replaced by any other ethnic group , so there is a high probability that the inhabitant of present-day lithuania have preserved the genetic composition of their forebear relatively undisturbed by the major demographic movement , although without being actually isolated from them . the lithuanian population appears to be relatively homogeneous , without apparent genetic difference among ethnic subgroup . </s> a 2004 analysis of mtdna in the lithuanian population revealed that lithuanian are close to the slavic language and finno-ugric language finno-ugric speaking population of northern and eastern europe . y chromosome y-chromosome snp [ analysis showed lithuanian to be closest to latvian ] and [ [ estonian . </s> according to 2014 estimate , the age structure of the population wa a follows : 014 year , 13.5 % ( male 243,001/female 230,674 ) ; 1564 year : 69.5 % ( male 1,200,196/female 1,235,300 ) ; 65 year and over : 16.8 % ( male 207,222/female 389,345 ) . the median age wa 41.2 year ( male : 38.5 , female : 43.7 ) . </s> lithuania ha a sub-replacement fertility rate : the total fertility rate ( tfr ) in lithuania is 1.59 child born/woman ( 2015 estimate ) . </s> , 29 % of birth were to unmarried woman . the age at first marriage in 2013 wa 27 year for woman and 29.3 year for men . </s> <section_title_start> ethnic groups <section_title_end> </s> ethnic lithuanian make up about five-sixths of the country 's population and lithuania ha the most homogeneous population in the baltic state . in 2015 , the population of lithuania stand at 2,921,262 , 84.2 % of whom are ethnic lithuanian people who speak lithuanian language , which is the official language of the country . several sizeable minority exist , such a pole ( 6.6 % ) , russian ( 5.8 % ) , belarusian ( 1.2 % ) and ukrainian ( 0.5 % ) . </s> pole in lithuania are the largest minority , concentrated in southeast lithuania ( the vilnius region ) . russian in lithuania are the second largest minority , concentrated mostly in two city . they constitute sizeable minority in vilnius ( 12 % ) and klaipda ( 19.6 % ) , and a majority in the town of visaginas ( 52 % ) . about 3,000 romani people live in lithuania , mostly in vilnius , kaunas and panevys ; their organization are supported by the national minority and emigration department . for century a small lipka tatar community ha flourished in lithuania . </s> the official language is lithuanian language , but in some area there is a significant presence of minority language , such a polish language , russian language , belarusian language and ukrainian language . the greatest presence of minority and the use of these language is in alininkai district municipality , vilnius district municipality and visaginas municipality . yiddish is spoken by member of the tiny remaining history of the jew in lithuania in lithuania . the state law guarantee education in minority language and there are numerous publicly funded school in the area populated by minority , with polish a the language of instruction being the most widely available . </s> according to the lithuanian population census of 2011 , about 85 % of the country 's population speak lithuanian a their native language , 7.2 % are native speaker of russian and 5.3 % of polish . about 39 % of lithuanian resident speak russian a a foreign language , 20 % english , 9 % german , 6 % polish , 3 % french . most lithuanian school teach english a the first foreign language , but student may also study german , or , in some school , french or russian . around 80 % of young people in lithuania know english . </s> lithuania ha accepted european migrant crisis # relocation and resettlement of asylum seeker under the migrant plan agreed upon by eu member state in 2015. </s> <section_title_start> urbanization <section_title_end> </s> there ha been a steady urbanization since the 1990s , encouraged by the planning of regional centre , such a alytus , marijampol , utena , plung , and maeikiai . by the early 21st century , about two-thirds of the total population lived in urban area . , 66.5 % of the total population life in urban area . lithuania 's larger urban zone include vilnius ( population 696,000 in 2016 ) and kaunas ( population 387,000 in 2016 ) . </s> <section_title_start> health <section_title_end> </s> lithuania provides free state-funded healthcare to all citizen and registered long-term resident . private healthcare is also available in the country . in 20032012 , the network of hospital wa restructured , a part of wider healthcare service reform . it started in 20032005 with the expansion of ambulatory service and primary care . </s> in 2016 , lithuania ranked 27th in europe in the euro health consumer index , a ranking of european healthcare system based on waiting time , result and other indicator . </s> lithuanian life expectancy at birth wa 73.4 ( 67.4 year for male and 78.8 for female ) and the infant mortality rate wa 6.2 per 1,000 birth . the annual population growth rate increased by 0.3 % in 2007 . at 33.5 people per 100,000 in 2012 , lithuania ha seen a dramatic rise in suicide in the post-soviet year , and now record the highest in europe ( case in rural area are five time more frequent than in city ) and the list of country by suicide rate age-standardized suicide rate in the world , according to the who . according to expert , this number wa largely influenced by the soviet ' authority because mostly christian country 's inhabitant previously considered it a a severe sin and were afraid to take their life . </s> by 2000 the vast majority of lithuanian health care institution were non-profit-making enterprise and a private sector developed , providing mostly outpatient service which are paid for out-of-pocket . the ministry of health ( lithuania ) also run a few health care facility and is involved in the running of the two major lithuanian teaching hospital . it is responsible for the state public health centre which manages the public health network including ten county public health centre with their local branch . the ten county of lithuania run county hospital and specialised health care facility . </s> there is now compulsory health insurance for lithuanian resident . there are 5
